Now serpent was more subtle beast field Jehovah God had made said woman Yea hath God said Ye not eat tree garden woman said serpent fruit trees garden eat fruit tree is midst garden God hath said Ye not eat ye touch lest ye die And serpent said woman Ye not surely die God know day eat thereof then eyes be opened ye be God knowing good evil And woman saw tree was good food was delight eyes tree was be desired make one wise took fruit thereof did eat gave also unto husband did eat And eyes were opened knew were naked sewed fig leaves together made heard voice Jehovah God walking garden cool day man wife hid presence Jehovah God amongst trees garden And Jehovah God called man said unto Where art thou said heard thy voice garden was afraid was naked hid myself And said Who told thou wast naked Hast thou eaten tree whereof commanded thee thou shouldest not eat man said woman thou gavest be gave tree did eat And Jehovah God said woman is thou hast done woman said serpent beguiled did eat And Jehovah God said serpent thou hast done cursed art thou cattle beast field thy belly shalt thou go dust shalt thou eat days thy life put enmity thee woman thy seed seed bruise thy head thou shalt bruise heel Unto woman said greatly multiply thy pain thy conception pain thou shalt bring forth children thy desire be thy husband rule thee And unto Adam said thou hast hearkened voice thy shalt thou eat bread till thou return ground wast thou taken dust thou art unto dust shalt thou return And man called wife name Eve was mother living And Jehovah God made Adam wife coats skins clothed them And Jehovah God said Behold man is become one know good evil now lest put hand take also tree life eat live ever therefore Jehovah God sent forth garden Eden till ground whence was taken So drove man placed east garden Eden Cherubim flame sword turned way keep way tree life

man knew Eve wife conceived bare Cain said have gotten man help   Jehovah And again bare brother Abel Abel was keeper sheep Cain was tiller ground And process time came pass Cain brought fruit ground offering unto Jehovah And Abel also brought firstlings flock fat thereof Jehovah had respect Abel offering unto Cain offering had not respect Cain was very wroth countenance fell And Jehovah said unto Cain art thou wroth is thy countenance fallen thou doest well not be lifted thou doest not well sin coucheth door thee be desire do thou rule it And Cain told Abel brother came pass were field Cain rose Abel brother slew him And Jehovah said unto Cain Where is Abel thy brother said know not am brother keeper said hast thou done voice thy brother blood crieth ground And now cursed art thou ground hath opened mouth receive thy brother blood thy hand thou tillest ground not henceforth yield unto thee strength fugitive wanderer shalt thou be earth And Cain said unto Jehovah My punishment is greater bear Behold thou hast day face ground thy face be hid be fugitive wanderer earth come pass whosoever findeth slay me And Jehovah said unto Therefore whosoever slayeth Cain vengeance be taken sevenfold Jehovah appointed sign Cain lest finding smite him And Cain went presence Jehovah dwelt land Nod east Eden And Cain knew wife conceived bare Enoch builded city called name city name son Enoch And Enoch was born Irad Irad begat Mehujael Mehujael begat Methushael Methushael begat Lamech And Lamech took two wives name one was Adah name other Zillah And Adah bare Jabal was father such said wives Adah Zillah hear voice Ye wives Lamech hearken unto speech have slain man wounding young man bruising Cain be avenged sevenfold Truly Lamech seventy sevenfold And Adam knew wife again bare is book generations Adam day God created man likeness God made male female created blessed called name Adam day were created And Adam lived hundred thirty years begat son   own likeness image called name Seth days Adam begat Seth were eight hundred years begat sons daughters And days Adam lived were nine hundred thirty years died And Seth lived hundred five years begat Enosh Seth lived begat Enosh eight hundred seven years begat sons daughters days Seth were nine hundred twelve years died And Enosh lived ninety years begat Kenan Enosh lived begat Kenan eight hundred fifteen years begat sons daughters days Enosh were nine hundred five years died And Kenan lived seventy years begat Mahalalel Kenan lived begat Mahalalel eight hundred forty years begat sons daughters days Kenan were nine hundred ten years died And Mahalalel lived sixty five years begat Jared Mahalalel lived begat Jared eight hundred thirty years begat sons daughters days Mahalalel were eight hundred ninety five years died And Jared lived hundred sixty two years begat Enoch Jared lived begat Enoch eight hundred years begat sons daughters days Jared were nine hundred sixty two years died And Enoch lived sixty five years begat Methuselah Enoch walked God begat Methuselah three hundred years begat sons daughters days Enoch were three hundred sixty five years Enoch walked God was not God took Methuselah lived hundred eighty seven years begat Lamech Methuselah lived begat Lamech seven hundred eighty two years begat sons daughters days Methuselah were nine hundred sixty nine years died And Lamech lived hundred eighty two years begat son called name Noah saying same comfort work toil hands   cometh   ground Jehovah hath cursed And Lamech lived begat Noah five hundred ninety five years begat sons daughters days Lamech were seven hundred seventy seven years died And Noah was five hundred years old Noah begat Shem Ham Japheth

came pass men began multiply face ground daughters were born sons God saw daughters men were fair took wives chose And Jehovah said My Spirit not strive man ever also is flesh yet days be hundred twenty years Nephilim were earth days also sons God came daughters men bare children same were mighty men were old men renown And Jehovah saw wickedness man was great earth imagination thoughts heart was only evil continually And repented Jehovah had made man earth grieved heart And Jehovah said destroy man have created face ground man beast creeping things birds heavens repenteth have made them But Noah found favor eyes Jehovah These are generations Noah Noah was righteous man     perfect generations Noah walked God And Noah begat three sons Shem Ham Japheth And earth was corrupt God earth was filled violence And God saw earth behold was corrupt flesh had corrupted way earth And God said unto Noah end flesh is come earth is filled violence behold destroy earth Make thee ark gopher wood rooms shalt thou make ark shalt pitch pitch And is thou shalt make length ark three hundred cubits breadth fifty cubits height thirty cubits A light shalt thou make ark cubit shalt finish upward door ark shalt thou set side thereof lower second third stories shalt thou make it And behold do bring flood waters earth destroy flesh wherein is breath life heaven everything is earth die But establish covenant thee thou shalt come ark thou thy sons thy wife thy sons wives thee And living thing flesh two sort shalt thou bring ark keep alive thee be male female Of birds kind cattle kind creeping thing ground kind two sort come unto thee keep take thou thee food is eaten gather thee be food thee them Thus did Noah according God commanded so did

Jehovah said unto Noah Come thou thy house ark thee have seen righteous generation Of clean beast thou shalt take thee seven seven male female beasts are not clean two male female birds also heavens seven seven male female keep seed alive face earth For yet seven days cause rain earth forty days forty nights living thing have made destroy face ground And Noah did according unto Jehovah commanded him And Noah was six hundred years old flood waters was earth And Noah went sons wife sons wives ark waters flood Of clean beasts beasts are not clean birds everything creepeth ground went two two unto Noah ark male female God commanded Noah And came pass seven days waters flood were earth In six hundredth year Noah life second month seventeenth day month same day were fountains great deep broken windows heaven were rain was earth forty days forty nights In selfsame day entered Noah Shem Ham Japheth sons Noah Noah wife three wives sons ark beast kind cattle kind creeping thing creepeth earth kind bird kind bird sort And went unto Noah ark two two flesh wherein is breath life And went went male female flesh God commanded Jehovah shut in And flood was forty days earth waters increased bare ark was lifted earth And waters prevailed increased greatly earth ark went face waters And waters prevailed exceedingly earth high mountains were whole heaven were covered Fifteen cubits upward did waters prevail mountains were covered And flesh died moved earth birds cattle beasts creeping thing creepeth earth man nostrils was breath spirit life was dry land died And living thing was destroyed was face ground man cattle creeping things birds heavens were destroyed earth Noah only was left were ark And waters prevailed earth hundred fifty days

God remembered Noah beasts cattle were ark God made wind pass earth waters assuaged fountains also deep windows heaven were stopped rain heaven was restrained waters returned earth continually end hundred fifty days waters decreased And ark rested seventh month seventeenth day month mountains Ararat And waters decreased continually tenth month tenth month first day month were tops mountains seen And came pass end forty days Noah opened window ark had made sent forth raven went forth fro waters were dried earth And sent forth dove see waters were abated face ground dove found rest sole foot returned unto ark waters were face whole earth put hand took brought unto ark And stayed yet other seven days again sent forth dove ark dove came eventide lo mouth olive leaf plucked so Noah knew waters were abated earth And stayed yet other seven days sent forth dove returned not again more And came pass six hundred first year first month first day month waters were dried earth Noah removed covering ark looked behold face ground was dried And second month seven twentieth day month was earth dry And God spake unto Noah saying Go forth ark thou thy wife thy sons thy sons wives thee Bring forth thee living thing is thee flesh birds cattle creeping thing creepeth earth breed abundantly earth be fruitful multiply earth And Noah went forth sons wife sons wives beast creeping thing bird moveth earth families went forth ark And Noah builded altar unto Jehovah took clean beast clean bird offered burnt offerings altar And Jehovah smelled sweet savor Jehovah said heart not again curse ground more man sake imagination man heart is evil youth again smite more everything living have done While earth remaineth seedtime harvest cold heat summer winter day night not cease

God blessed Noah sons said Be fruitful multiply replenish earth And fear dread be upon beast earth bird heavens wherewith ground teemeth fishes sea hand are delivered Every moving thing liveth be food green herb have given all But flesh life thereof   is blood thereof ye not eat And surely blood   blood   lives require hand beast require hand man even hand man brother require life man Whoso sheddeth man blood man blood be shed image God made man And be ye fruitful multiply bring forth abundantly earth multiply therein And God spake unto Noah sons saying behold establish covenant seed living creature is birds cattle beast earth go ark even beast earth And establish covenant flesh be cut more waters flood there more be flood destroy earth And God said is token covenant make living creature is perpetual generations do set bow cloud be token covenant earth And come pass bring cloud earth bow be seen cloud remember covenant is living creature flesh waters no more become flood destroy flesh And bow be cloud look remember everlasting covenant God living creature flesh is earth And God said unto Noah is token covenant have established flesh is earth And sons Noah went forth ark were Shem Ham Japheth Ham is father Canaan These three were sons Noah was whole earth Noah began be husbandman planted vineyard drank wine was drunken was uncovered tent And Ham father Canaan saw nakedness father told two brethren without And Shem Japheth took garment laid shoulders went backward covered nakedness father faces were backward saw not father nakedness And Noah awoke wine knew youngest son had done unto him And said Cursed be Canaan A servant servants be brethren And said Blessed be Jehovah God Shem let Canaan be servant God enlarge Japheth let dwell tents Shem let Canaan be servant And Noah lived flood three hundred fifty years And days Noah were nine hundred fifty years died

Now are generations sons Noah   namely   Shem Ham Japheth unto were sons born flood The sons Japheth Gomer Magog Madai Javan Tubal Meshech Tiras And sons Gomer Ashkenaz Riphath Togarmah And sons Javan Elishah Tarshish Kittim Dodanim Of were isles nations divided lands one tongue families nations And sons Ham Cush Mizraim Put Canaan And sons Cush Seba Havilah Sabtah Raamah Sabteca sons Raamah Sheba Dedan And Cush begat Nimrod began be mighty one earth He was mighty hunter Jehovah wherefore is said Nimrod mighty hunter Jehovah And beginning kingdom was Babel Erech Accad Calneh land Shinar Out land went forth Assyria builded Nineveh Rehoboth Ir Calah Resen Nineveh Calah same is great city  And Mizraim begat Ludim Anamim Lehabim Naphtuhim Pathrusim Casluhim whence went Caphtorim And Canaan begat Sidon first born Heth Jebusite Amorite Girgashite Hivite Arkite Sinite Arvadite Zemarite Hamathite afterward were families Canaanite spread abroad And border Canaanite was Sidon thou goest Gerar unto Gaza thou goest Sodom Gomorrah Admah Zeboiim Lasha These are sons Ham families tongues lands nations And Shem father children Eber elder brother Japheth also were children born The sons Shem Elam Asshur Arpachshad Lud Aram And sons Aram Uz Hul Gether Mash And Arpachshad begat Shelah Shelah begat Eber And Eber were born two sons name one was Peleg days was earth divided brother name was Joktan And Joktan begat Almodad Sheleph Hazarmaveth Jerah Hadoram Uzal Diklah Obal Abimael Sheba Ophir Havilah Jobab were sons Joktan And dwelling was Mesha thou goest Sephar mountain east These are sons Shem families tongues lands nations These are families sons Noah generations nations were nations divided earth flood

Terah hundred nineteen years begat sons daughters And Terah lived seventy years begat Abram Nahor Haran Now are generations Terah Terah begat Abram Nahor Haran Haran begat Lot And Haran died father Terah land nativity Ur Chaldees And Abram Nahor took wives name Abram wife was Sarai name Nahor wife Milcah daughter Haran father Milcah father Iscah And Sarai was barren had child And Terah took Abram son Lot son Haran son son Sarai daughter in law son Abram wife went forth Ur Chaldees go land Canaan came unto Haran dwelt there And days Terah were two hundred five years Terah died Haran

Now Jehovah said unto Abram Get thee thy country thy kindred thy father house land show thee make thee great nation bless thee make name great be thou blessing bless bless thee curseth thee curse thee families earth be blessed So Abram went Jehovah had spoken unto Lot went Abram was seventy five years old departed Haran And Abram took Sarai wife Lot brother son substance had gathered souls had gotten Haran went forth go land Canaan land Canaan came And Abram passed land place Shechem oak Moreh Canaanite was then land And Jehovah appeared unto Abram said Unto thy seed give land there builded altar unto Jehovah appeared unto him And removed thence mountain east Beth el pitched tent having Beth el west Ai east builded altar unto Jehovah called name Jehovah And Abram journeyed going still South And was famine land Abram went down Egypt sojourn there famine was sore land And came pass was come enter Egypt said unto Sarai wife Behold now know thou art fair woman look come pass see thee say is wife kill save thee pray thee thou art sister be well thy sake soul live thee And came pass Abram was come Egypt beheld woman was very fair And princes Pharaoh saw praised Pharaoh woman was taken Pharaoh house And dealt well Abram sake had sheep oxen he asses men servants maid servants she asses camels And Jehovah plagued Pharaoh house great plagues Sarai Abram wife And Pharaoh called Abram said is thou hast done didst thou not tell was thy wife saidst thou is sister took be wife now therefore behold thy wife take go thy way And Pharaoh gave men charge concerning brought way wife had

Abram went Egypt wife had Lot South And Abram was very rich cattle silver gold And went journeys South even Beth el place tent had been beginning Beth el Ai place altar had made there first Abram called name Jehovah And Lot also went Abram had flocks herds tents And land was not able bear dwell together substance was great not dwell was strife herdsmen Abram cattle herdsmen Lot cattle Canaanite Perizzite dwelt then land And Abram said unto Lot Let be strife pray thee thee herdsmen thy herdsmen are brethren Is not whole land thee separate thyself pray thee   thou wilt take left hand then go right   thou take   right hand then go left And Lot lifted eyes beheld Plain Jordan was well watered Jehovah destroyed Sodom Gomorrah garden Jehovah land Egypt thou goest Zoar So Lot chose Plain Jordan Lot journeyed east separated one other Abram dwelt land Canaan Lot dwelt cities Plain moved tent as far Sodom Now men Sodom were wicked sinners Jehovah Jehovah said unto Abram Lot was separated Lift up now thine eyes look place thou art northward southward eastward westward land thou seest thee give thy seed ever And make thy seed dust earth so man number dust earth then thy seed also be numbered Arise walk land length breadth unto thee give it And Abram moved tent came dwelt oaks Mamre are Hebron built altar unto Jehovah

things word Jehovah came unto Abram vision saying Fear not Abram am thy shield     thy exceeding great reward And Abram said O Lord Jehovah wilt thou give seeing go childless be possessor house is Eliezer Damascus Abram said Behold thou hast given seed lo one born house is mine heir And behold word Jehovah came unto saying man not be thine heir come forth thine own bowels be thine heir And brought forth abroad said Look now heaven number stars thou be able number said unto So thy seed believed Jehovah reckoned righteousness And said unto am Jehovah brought Ur Chaldees give thee land inherit it And said O Lord Jehovah know inherit said unto Take heifer three years old she goat three years old ram three years old turtle dove young pigeon And took divided midst laid half other birds divided not And birds prey came down carcasses Abram drove sun was going down deep sleep fell Abram lo horror great darkness fell upon him And said unto Abram Know surety thy seed be sojourners land is not theirs serve afflict four hundred years also nation serve judge afterward come great substance But thou shalt go thy fathers peace shalt be buried good old age And fourth generation come hither again iniquity Amorite is not yet full And came pass sun went down was dark behold smoking furnace flaming torch passed pieces In day Jehovah made covenant Abram saying Unto thy seed have given land river Egypt great river river Euphrates Kenite Kenizzite Kadmonite Hittite Perizzite Rephaim Amorite Canaanite Girgashite Jebusite

Now Sarai Abram wife bare children had handmaid Egyptian name was Hagar And Sarai said unto Abram Behold now Jehovah hath restrained bearing go pray thee unto handmaid be obtain children Abram hearkened voice Sarai And Sarai Abram wife took Hagar Egyptian handmaid Abram had dwelt ten years land Canaan gave Abram husband be wife And went unto Hagar conceived saw had conceived mistress was despised eyes And Sarai said unto Abram My wrong be upon thee gave handmaid thy bosom saw had conceived was despised eyes Jehovah judge thee But Abram said unto Sarai Behold thy maid is thy hand do her is good thine eyes Sarai dealt hardly fled face And angel Jehovah found fountain water wilderness fountain way Shur And said Hagar Sarai handmaid whence camest thou goest thou said am fleeing face mistress Sarai And angel Jehovah said Return thy mistress submit hands And angel Jehovah said greatly multiply thy seed not be numbered multitude And angel Jehovah said Behold thou art child shalt bear son thou shalt call name Ishmael Jehovah hath heard thy affliction And be     wild ass men hand   be   man man hand dwell brethren And called name Jehovah spake Thou art God seeth said Have even here looked seeth well was called Beer lahai roi behold is Kadesh Bered And Hagar bare Abram son Abram called name son Hagar bare Ishmael And Abram was fourscore six years old Hagar bare Ishmael Abram

Abram was ninety years old nine Jehovah appeared Abram said unto am God Almighty walk be thou perfect And make covenant thee multiply thee exceedingly And Abram fell face God talked saying behold covenant is thee thou shalt be father multitude nations Neither thy name more be called Abram thy name be Abraham father multitude nations have made thee And make thee exceeding fruitful make nations thee kings come thee And establish covenant thee thy seed thee generations everlasting covenant be God unto thee thy seed thee And give unto thee thy seed thee land thy sojournings land Canaan everlasting possession be God And God said unto Abraham thee thou shalt keep covenant thou thy seed thee generations This is covenant ye keep thy seed thee male be circumcised And be circumcised flesh foreskin be token covenant you And is eight days old be circumcised male generations is born house bought money foreigner is not thy seed He is born thy house is bought thy money needs be circumcised covenant be flesh everlasting covenant And uncircumcised male is not circumcised flesh foreskin soul be cut people hath broken covenant And God said unto Abraham Sarai thy wife thou shalt not call name Sarai Sarah name be And bless moreover give thee son yea bless be   mother   nations kings peoples be her Then Abraham fell face laughed said heart child be born is hundred years old Sarah is ninety years old bear Abraham said unto God Oh Ishmael live thee God said Nay Sarah thy wife bear son thou shalt call name Isaac establish covenant everlasting covenant seed   Ishmael have heard thee behold have blessed make fruitful multiply exceedingly twelve princes beget make great nation But covenant establish Isaac Sarah bear unto thee set time next year And left talking God went Abraham And Abraham took Ishmael son were born house were bought money male men Abraham house circumcised flesh foreskin selfsame day God had said unto him And Abraham was ninety years old nine was circumcised flesh foreskin And Ishmael son was thirteen years old was circumcised flesh foreskin In selfsame day was Abraham circumcised Ishmael son And men house born house bought money foreigner were circumcised

Jehovah appeared oaks Mamre sat tent door heat day lifted eyes looked lo three men stood saw ran meet tent door bowed earth said My lord now have found favor thy sight pass not away pray thee thy servant let now little water be fetched wash feet rest yourselves tree fetch morsel bread strengthen ye heart ye pass forasmuch ye are come servant said So do thou hast said And Abraham hastened tent unto Sarah said Make ready quickly three measures fine meal knead make cakes And Abraham ran herd fetched calf tender good gave servant hasted dress it And took butter milk calf had dressed set stood tree did eat And said unto Where is Sarah thy wife said Behold tent And said certainly return thee season cometh round Sarah thy wife have son Sarah heard tent door was him Now Abraham Sarah were old     well stricken age had ceased be Sarah manner women And Sarah laughed saying am waxed old have pleasure lord being old also Jehovah said unto Abraham Wherefore did Sarah laugh saying Shall surety child am old Is anything too hard Jehovah set time return unto thee season cometh round Sarah have son Then Sarah denied saying laughed not was afraid said Nay thou didst men rose thence looked Sodom Abraham went bring way And Jehovah said Shall hide Abraham do seeing Abraham surely become great mighty nation nations earth be blessed have known end command children household keep way Jehovah do righteousness justice end Jehovah bring Abraham hath spoken him And Jehovah said cry Sodom Gomorrah is great sin is very grievous go down now see have done altogether according cry is come not know And men turned thence went Sodom Abraham stood yet Jehovah And Abraham drew near said Wilt thou consume righteous wicked Peradventure are fifty righteous city wilt thou consume not spare place fifty righteous are therein be far thee do manner slay righteous wicked so righteous be wicked be far thee not Judge earth do right Jehovah said find Sodom fifty righteous city then spare place sake And Abraham answered said Behold now have taken speak Lord am dust ashes peradventure lack five fifty righteous wilt thou destroy city lack five said not destroy find forty five And spake yet again said Peradventure be forty there said not do forty sake And said Oh let not Lord be angry speak peradventure thirty be found there said not do find thirty there And said Behold now have taken speak Lord peradventure be twenty found there said not destroy twenty sake And said Oh let not Lord be angry speak yet once peradventure ten be found there said not destroy ten sake And Jehovah went way as soon had left communing Abraham Abraham returned place

two angels came Sodom even Lot sat gate Sodom Lot saw rose meet bowed face earth said Behold now lords turn aside pray servant house tarry night wash feet ye rise up early go way said Nay abide street urged greatly turned unto entered house made feast did bake unleavened bread did eat But lay down men city   even   men Sodom compassed house round young old people quarter called unto Lot said unto are men came thee night bring unto know them And Lot went door shut door him And said pray brethren do not so wickedly Behold now have two daughters have not known man let pray bring do ye is good eyes only men do nothing forasmuch are come shadow roof And said Stand back said one fellow came sojourn needs be judge now deal worse thee pressed sore man even Lot drew near break door But men put hand brought Lot house shut door And smote men were door house blindness small great wearied find door And men said unto Lot Hast thou here besides son in law thy sons thy daughters whomsoever thou hast city bring place destroy place cry is waxed great Jehovah Jehovah hath sent destroy it And Lot went spake unto sons in law married daughters said Up get place Jehovah destroy city seemed unto sons in law one mocked And morning arose then angels hastened Lot saying Arise take thy wife thy two daughters are here lest thou be consumed iniquity city But lingered men laid hold hand hand wife hand two daughters Jehovah being merciful brought forth set city And came pass had brought forth abroad said Escape thy life not thee stay thou Plain escape mountain lest thou be consumed And Lot said not so lord behold now thy servant hath found favor thy sight thou hast magnified thy lovingkindness thou hast showed saving life not escape mountain lest evil overtake die behold now city is flee unto is little one let escape thither is not little one soul live And said unto See have accepted thee concerning thing also not overthrow city thou hast spoken Haste thee escape thither not do anything till thou be come thither Therefore name city was called Zoar The sun was risen earth Lot came unto Zoar Then Jehovah rained Sodom Gomorrah brimstone fire Jehovah heaven overthrew cities mother womb naked return thither Jehovah gave Jehovah hath taken away blessed be name Jehovah In Job sinned not charged God foolishly

Again came pass day sons God came present Jehovah Satan came also present Jehovah And Jehovah said unto Satan From whence comest thou Satan answered Jehovah said From going fro earth walking down it And Jehovah said unto Satan Hast thou considered servant Job is none earth perfect upright man one feareth God turneth away evil still holdeth fast integrity thou destroy cause And Satan answered Jehovah said Skin skin yea man hath give life But put forth thy hand now touch bone flesh renounce thee thy face And Jehovah said unto Satan Behold is thy hand only spare life So Satan went forth presence Jehovah smote Job sore boils sole foot crown And took potsherd scrape therewith sat ashes Then said wife Dost thou still hold fast thine integrity renounce God die But said Thou speakest one foolish women speaketh receive good hand God not receive evil did not Job sin lips Now Job three friends heard evil was come came one own place Eliphaz Temanite Bildad Shuhite Zophar Naamathite made appointment together come bemoan comfort him And lifted eyes off knew not lifted voice wept rent one robe sprinkled dust heads heaven So sat ground seven days seven nights none spake word saw grief was very great

opened Job mouth cursed day And Job answered said Let day perish wherein was born night said is man child conceived Let day be darkness Let not God seek let light shine it Let darkness shadow death claim own Let cloud dwell Let maketh black day terrify it As night let thick darkness seize Let not rejoice days year Let not come number months Lo let night be barren Let joyful voice come curse curse day are ready rouse leviathan Let stars twilight thereof be dark Let look light have none let behold eyelids morning shut not doors   mother   womb Nor hid trouble mine eyes Why died not womb did not give ghost mother bare did knees receive breast suck now have lain been quiet have slept then had been rest kings counsellors earth built waste places princes had gold filled houses silver hidden untimely birth had not been infants never saw light There wicked cease troubling weary are rest There prisoners are ease together hear not voice taskmaster The small great are there servant is free master Wherefore is light given is misery life bitter soul long death cometh not dig more hid treasures Who rejoice exceedingly are glad find grave   is light given   man way is hid God hath hedged sighing cometh eat groanings are poured thing fear cometh am afraid cometh unto me I am not ease am quiet have rest trouble cometh

Then answered Eliphaz Temanite said one assay commune thee thou be grieved withhold speaking Behold thou hast instructed many thou hast strengthened weak hands Thy words have upholden was falling thou hast made firm feeble knees But now is come unto thee thou faintest toucheth thee thou art troubled Is not thy fear   God   thy confidence     integrity thy ways hope Remember pray thee   ever   perished being innocent were upright cut According have seen plow iniquity sow trouble reap same By breath God perish blast anger are consumed The roaring lion voice fierce lion teeth young lions are broken The old lion perisheth lack prey whelps lioness are scattered thing was secretly brought mine ear received whisper thereof In thoughts visions night deep sleep falleth men Fear came trembling Which made bones shake Then spirit passed face hair flesh stood up It stood still not discern appearance thereof form was mine eyes   was   silence heard voice   saying   Shall mortal man be more just God Shall man be more pure Maker Behold putteth trust servants angels chargeth folly much more dwell houses clay Whose foundation is dust are crushed moth Betwixt morning evening are destroyed perish ever regarding it Is not tent cord plucked die wisdom

Call now is answer thee holy ones wilt thou turn vexation killeth foolish man jealousy slayeth silly one I have seen foolish taking root suddenly cursed habitation His children are far safety are crushed gate is there deliver Whose hungry eateth taketh even thorns snare gapeth substance For affliction cometh not forth dust trouble spring ground man is born unto trouble sparks fly upward But seek unto God unto God commit cause Who doeth great things unsearchable Marvellous things number giveth rain earth sendeth waters fields setteth high are low mourn are exalted safety He frustrateth devices crafty hands not perform enterprise He wise own craftiness counsel cunning is carried headlong They meet darkness day time grope noonday night But saveth sword mouth Even needy hand mighty So poor hath hope iniquity stoppeth mouth Behold happy is man God correcteth Therefore despise not thou chastening Almighty For maketh sore bindeth woundeth hands make whole He deliver thee six troubles Yea seven evil touch thee In famine redeem thee death war power sword Thou shalt be hid scourge tongue shalt thou be afraid destruction cometh At destruction dearth thou shalt laugh shalt thou be afraid beasts earth For thou shalt be league stones field beasts field be peace thee And thou shalt know thy tent is peace thou shalt visit thy fold shalt miss nothing Thou shalt know also thy seed be great thine offspring grass earth Thou shalt come thy grave full age shock grain cometh season Lo have searched is Hear know thou thy good

Then Job answered said Oh vexation were weighed calamity laid balances now be heavier sand seas Therefore have words been rash For arrows Almighty are poison spirit drinketh terrors God do set array wild ass bray hath grass loweth ox fodder hath savor be eaten salt is there taste white egg soul refuseth touch     are loathsome food me Oh have request God grant     thing long Even please God crush let loose hand cut be still consolation Yea let exult pain spareth not have not denied words Holy One What is strength wait is mine end be patient Is strength strength stones is flesh brass Is not have help wisdom is driven quite is ready faint kindness   be showed friend Even forsaketh fear Almighty My brethren have dealt deceitfully brook channel brooks pass away Which are black reason ice     wherein snow hideth time wax warm vanish is hot are consumed place The caravans   travel   way turn aside go up waste perish The caravans Tema looked companies Sheba waited them They were put shame had hoped came thither were confounded For now are nothing Ye see terror are afraid Did say Give Offer present substance Deliver adversary hand Redeem hand oppressors Teach hold peace cause understand wherein have erred How forcible are words uprightness reproof doth reprove Do ye think reprove words Seeing speeches one is desperate are wind cast   lots   fatherless make merchandise friend Now therefore be pleased look surely not lie face Return pray let be injustice Yea return again cause is righteous Is injustice tongue not taste discern mischievous things

Is not warfare man earth are not days days hireling servant earnestly desireth shadow hireling looketh wages So am made possess months misery wearisome nights are appointed me When lie down say arise night be gone am full tossings fro dawning day My flesh is clothed worms clods dust skin closeth breaketh afresh My days are swifter weaver shuttle are spent hope Oh remember life is breath Mine eye no more see good The eye seeth behold more Thine eyes be not be As cloud is consumed vanisheth away goeth down Sheol come more He return more house place know more Therefore not refrain mouth speak anguish spirit complain bitterness soul Am sea sea monster thou settest watch say bed comfort My couch ease complaint Then thou scarest dreams terrifiest visions So soul chooseth strangling death rather     bones I loathe   life   not live alway Let alone days are is man thou shouldest magnify thou shouldest set thy mind thou shouldest visit morning try moment long wilt thou not look away let alone till swallow spittle have sinned do unto thee O thou watcher men hast thou set mark thee am burden myself dost thou not pardon transgression take mine iniquity now lie down dust thou wilt seek diligently not be

Then answered Bildad Shuhite said How long wilt thou speak things   long   words thy mouth be   mighty wind Doth God pervert justice doth Almighty pervert righteousness thy children have sinned hath delivered hand transgression thou wouldest seek diligently unto God make thy supplication Almighty thou wert pure upright Surely now awake thee make habitation thy righteousness prosperous And thy beginning was small thy latter end greatly increase For inquire pray thee former age apply fathers have searched are yesterday know nothing days earth are shadow not teach thee tell thee utter words heart rush grow mire flag grow water is yet greenness     not cut down withereth   other   herb So are paths forget God hope godless man perish Whose confidence break sunder trust is spider web He lean house not stand hold fast thereby not endure He is green sun shoots go forth garden His roots are wrapped   stone    heap beholdeth place stones If be destroyed place Then deny saying   have not seen thee Behold is joy way earth others spring Behold God not cast perfect man uphold evil doers He yet fill thy mouth laughter thy lips shouting They hate thee be clothed shame tent wicked be more

Then Job answered said truth know is so man be just God be pleased contend not answer one thousand   is   wise heart mighty strength hath hardened prospered   Him   removeth mountains know not overturneth anger shaketh earth place pillars thereof tremble commandeth sun riseth not sealeth stars alone stretcheth heavens treadeth waves sea maketh Bear Orion Pleiades chambers south doeth great things finding Yea marvellous things number Lo goeth see not passeth also perceive not Behold seizeth prey   hinder say doest thou God not withdraw anger helpers Rahab do stoop him How much less answer choose words   reason   Whom were righteous yet not make supplication judge If had called had answered not believe hearkened unto voice For breaketh tempest multiplieth wounds cause He not suffer take breath filleth bitterness If   speak   strength lo   is   mighty justice Who   saith   summon be righteous mine own mouth condemn be perfect prove perverse I am perfect regard not despise life It is one therefore say destroyeth perfect wicked If scourge slay suddenly mock trial innocent The earth is given hand wicked covereth faces judges thereof   be   not     then is Now days are swifter post flee away see good are passed away swift ships eagle swoopeth prey If say forget complaint put   sad   countenance be good cheer am afraid sorrows know thou wilt not hold innocent I be condemned then do labor vain wash snow water make hands never so clean wilt thou plunge ditch mine own clothes abhor me For is not man am answer come together judgment There is umpire betwixt lay hand both Let take rod away let not terror make afraid Then speak not fear am not so

soul is weary life give free course complaint speak bitterness soul I say unto God Do not condemn Show wherefore thou contendest me Is good unto thee thou shouldest oppress thou shouldest despise work thy hands shine counsel wicked Hast thou eyes flesh seest thou man seeth Are thy days days man thy years man days thou inquirest mine iniquity searchest sin thou knowest am not wicked is none deliver thy hand Thy hands have framed fashioned Together round thou dost destroy me Remember beseech thee thou hast fashioned clay wilt thou bring dust again Hast not poured milk curdled cheese Thou hast clothed skin flesh knit together bones sinews Thou hast granted life lovingkindness thy visitation hath preserved spirit Yet things thou didst hide thy heart know is thee sin then thou markest thou wilt not acquit mine iniquity If be wicked woe be righteous yet not lift head Being filled ignominy looking mine affliction And   head   exalt thou huntest lion again thou showest marvellous me Thou renewest thy witnesses increasest thine indignation Changes warfare are me Wherefore then hast thou brought forth womb had given ghost eye had seen me I have been had not been have been carried womb grave Are not days few cease then let alone take comfort little go whence not return   Even   land darkness shadow death land dark midnight   land   shadow death order light is midnight

Then answered Zophar Naamathite said not multitude words be answered man full talk be justified thy boastings make men hold peace thou mockest man make thee ashamed thou sayest My doctrine is pure am clean thine eyes But oh God speak open lips thee show thee secrets wisdom is manifold understanding Know therefore God exacteth thee less thine iniquity deserveth Canst thou searching find God Canst thou find Almighty unto perfection is high heaven canst thou do Deeper Sheol canst thou know measure thereof is longer earth broader sea If pass shut call unto judgment then hinder knoweth false men seeth iniquity also even consider not But vain man is void understanding Yea man is born     wild ass colt If thou set thy heart aright stretch thy hands iniquity be thy hand put far away let not unrighteousness dwell thy tents Surely then shalt thou lift thy face spot Yea thou shalt be stedfast shalt not fear thou shalt forget thy misery Thou shalt remember waters are passed away   thy   life be clearer noonday be darkness be morning And thou shalt be secure is hope Yea thou shalt search   thee   shalt take thy rest safety Also thou shalt lie down none make thee afraid Yea many make suit thee But eyes wicked fail have way flee hope be giving ghost

Then Job answered said No doubt ye are people wisdom die you But have understanding as well am not inferior Yea knoweth not such things am one is laughing stock neighbor called upon God answered just perfect man is laughing stock In thought is ease is contempt misfortune is ready foot slippeth The tents robbers prosper provoke God are secure Into hand God bringeth   abundantly    But ask now beasts teach thee birds heavens tell thee speak earth teach thee fishes sea declare unto thee Who knoweth not hand Jehovah hath wrought hand is soul living thing breath mankind Doth not ear try words Even palate tasteth food aged men is wisdom length days understanding With   God   is wisdom hath counsel understanding Behold breaketh down not be built again shutteth man be opening Behold withholdeth waters dry up Again sendeth overturn earth With is strength wisdom deceived deceiver are his He leadeth counsellors away stripped judges maketh fools He looseth bond kings bindeth loins girdle He leadeth priests away stripped overthroweth mighty He removeth speech trusty taketh understanding elders He poureth contempt princes looseth belt strong He uncovereth deep things darkness bringeth light shadow death He increaseth nations destroyeth enlargeth nations leadeth captive He taketh understanding chiefs people earth causeth wander wilderness is way They grope dark light maketh stagger drunken man

Lo mine eye hath seen     Mine ear hath heard understood it What ye know   same   do know also am not inferior you Surely speak Almighty desire reason God But ye are forgers lies Ye are physicians value Oh ye altogether hold peace be wisdom Hear now reasoning hearken pleadings lips Will ye speak unrighteously God talk deceitfully ye show partiality ye contend God Is good search one deceiveth man ye deceive surely reprove ye do secretly show partiality Shall not majesty make afraid dread fall memorable sayings are proverbs ashes defences are defences clay Hold peace let alone speak let come will Wherefore take flesh teeth put life hand Behold slay have hope Nevertheless maintain ways him This also be salvation godless man not come him Hear diligently speech let declaration be ears Behold now have set cause order know am righteous Who is contend then hold peace give ghost Only do not two things Then not hide thy face Withdraw thy hand far let not thy terror make afraid Then call thou answer let speak answer thou many are mine iniquities sins Make know transgression sin Wherefore hidest thou thy face holdest thine enemy Wilt thou harass driven leaf wilt thou pursue dry stubble thou writest bitter things makest inherit iniquities youth Thou feet also stocks markest paths Thou settest bound soles feet am rotten thing consumeth garment is moth eaten

Man is born woman Is few days full trouble He cometh forth flower is cut down fleeth also shadow continueth not And dost thou open thine eyes one bringest judgment thee bring clean thing unclean not one Seeing days are determined number months is thee thou hast appointed bounds not pass Look rest Till accomplish hireling day For is hope tree be cut sprout again tender branch thereof not cease Though root thereof wax old earth stock thereof die ground scent water bud put forth boughs plant But man dieth is laid low Yea man giveth ghost is     waters fail sea river wasteth drieth So man lieth down riseth not Till heavens be no more not awake be roused sleep Oh thou wouldest hide Sheol That thou wouldest keep secret thy wrath be past thou wouldest appoint set time remember man die live   again   days warfare wait Till release come Thou wouldest call answer thee Thou wouldest have desire work thy hands But now thou numberest steps Dost not watch sin transgression is sealed bag thou fastenest mine mountain falling cometh rock is removed place waters wear stones overflowings thereof wash dust earth So thou destroyest hope man Thou prevailest ever passeth Thou changest countenance sendest away His sons come honor knoweth not are brought low perceiveth not them But flesh hath pain soul

Then answered Eliphaz Temanite said wise man make answer vain knowledge fill east wind reason unprofitable talk speeches do good thou doest away fear hinderest devotion God For thine iniquity teacheth thy mouth thou choosest tongue crafty Thine own mouth condemneth thee not Yea thine own lips testify thee Art first man was born wast thou brought forth hills Hast thou heard secret counsel God dost thou limit wisdom thyself knowest thou know not understandest thou is not are gray headed very aged men Much elder thy father Are consolations God too small thee Even word is gentle thee thy heart carry thee do thine eyes flash God thou turnest thy spirit lettest words go thy mouth is man be clean is born woman be righteous Behold putteth trust holy ones Yea heavens are not clean sight much less one is abominable corrupt A man drinketh iniquity water show thee hear have seen declare Which wise men have told fathers have not hid Unto alone land was given stranger passed wicked man travaileth pain days Even number years are laid oppressor A sound terrors is ears prosperity destroyer come him He believeth not return darkness is waited sword He wandereth abroad bread   saying   Where is knoweth day darkness is ready hand Distress anguish make afraid prevail king ready battle Because hath stretched hand God behaveth proudly Almighty runneth   stiff   neck thick bosses bucklers hath covered face fatness gathered fat loins hath dwelt desolate cities houses man inhabited Which were ready become heaps not be rich substance continue possessions be extended earth He not depart darkness flame dry branches breath   God   mouth go away Let not trust vanity deceiving vanity be recompense It be accomplished time branch not be green He shake unripe grape vine cast flower olive tree For company godless be barren fire consume tents bribery They conceive mischief bring forth iniquity heart prepareth deceit

Then Job answered said have heard many such things Miserable comforters are ye all Shall vain words have end provoketh thee thou also speak ye do soul were soul stead join words together shake head     strengthen mouth solace lips assuage   grief speak grief is not assuaged forbear am eased now made weary Thou hast made desolate company And thou hast laid fast hold   is witness     leanness riseth testifieth face He hath wrath persecuted hath gnashed teeth Mine adversary sharpeneth eyes me They have gaped mouth have smitten cheek reproachfully gather together me God delivereth ungodly casteth hands wicked I was ease brake asunder Yea hath taken neck dashed pieces hath also set mark His archers compass round about cleaveth reins asunder doth not spare poureth gall ground He breach breach runneth giant I have sewed sackcloth skin have laid horn dust My face is red weeping eyelids is shadow death is violence hands prayer is pure O earth cover not thou blood let cry have   resting    place Even now behold witness is heaven voucheth is high My friends scoff     mine eye poureth tears God maintain right man God son man neighbor few years are come go way whence not return

spirit is consumed days are extinct grave is   ready   me Surely are mockers mine eye dwelleth provocation Give now pledge be surety is strike hands thou hast hid heart understanding Therefore shalt not exalt      He denounceth friends prey Even eyes children fail But hath made byword people spit face Mine eye also is dim reason sorrow members are shadow Upright men be astonished innocent stir godless Yet righteous hold way hath clean hands wax stronger stronger But come now again not find wise man you My days are past purposes are broken Even thoughts heart They change night day light   say   is darkness If look Sheol house have spread couch darkness have said corruption Thou art father worm   Thou art   mother sister Where then is hope hope see go bars Sheol once is rest dust

Then answered Bildad Shuhite said How long ye hunt words Consider speak Wherefore are counted beasts     are become unclean sight Thou tearest thyself thine anger earth be forsaken thee rock be removed place light wicked be put spark fire not shine The light be dark tent lamp be put out The steps strength be straitened own counsel cast down For is cast net own feet walketh toils A gin take     heel     snare lay hold him A noose is hid ground trap way Terrors make afraid side chase heels His strength be hunger bitten calamity be ready side The members body be devoured   Yea   first born death devour members He be rooted tent trusteth be brought king terrors There dwell tent is none Brimstone be scattered habitation His roots be dried beneath branch be cut off His remembrance perish earth have name street He be driven light darkness chased world He have son son son people remaining sojourned They come be astonished day went were affrighted Surely such are dwellings unrighteous is place knoweth not God

Then Job answered said How long ye vex soul break pieces words ten times have ye reproached Ye are not ashamed ye deal hardly me And be indeed have erred Mine error remaineth myself If indeed ye magnify yourselves plead reproach Know now God hath subverted   cause   hath compassed net Behold cry wrong am not heard cry help is justice He hath walled way not pass hath set darkness paths He hath stripped glory taken crown head He hath side am gone hope hath plucked tree He hath also kindled wrath counteth unto   one   adversaries His troops come together cast way encamp round tent He hath put brethren far mine acquaintance are wholly estranged me My kinsfolk have failed familiar friends have forgotten me They dwell house maids count stranger am alien sight I call servant giveth answer   Though   entreat mouth My breath is strange wife supplication children mine own mother Even young children despise arise speak familiar friends loved are turned me My bone cleaveth skin flesh am escaped skin teeth Have pity have pity O friends hand God hath touched me Why do ye persecute God are not satisfied flesh words were now written were inscribed book iron pen lead were graven rock ever know Redeemer liveth last stand earth skin   even     body   is destroyed Then flesh see God Whom even see side mine eyes behold not stranger heart is consumed me If ye say persecute root matter is found Be afraid sword wrath   bringeth   punishments sword ye know is judgment

Then answered Zophar Naamathite said Therefore do thoughts give answer Even reason haste is me I have heard reproof putteth shame spirit understanding answereth me Knowest thou   not   old time man was placed earth triumphing wicked is short joy godless moment height mount up heavens head reach clouds perish ever own dung have seen say is fly away dream not be found Yea be chased away vision night The eye saw see more place more behold him His children seek favor poor hands give wealth His bones are full youth lie dust Though wickedness be sweet mouth hide tongue spare not let go keep still mouth food bowels is turned is gall asps him He hath swallowed down riches vomit again God cast belly He suck poison asps viper tongue slay him He not look rivers flowing streams honey butter That labored restore not swallow According substance hath gotten not rejoice For hath oppressed forsaken poor hath violently taken house not build knew quietness not save aught wherein delighteth There was nothing left devoured not Therefore prosperity not endure In fulness sufficiency be straits hand one is misery come him When is fill belly   God   cast fierceness wrath rain is eating He flee iron weapon bow brass strike through He draweth forth cometh body Yea glittering point cometh gall Terrors are him All darkness is laid treasures fire not blown   man   devour consume is left tent The heavens reveal iniquity earth rise him The increase house depart   goods   flow away day wrath This is portion wicked man God heritage appointed God

Then Job answered said Hear diligently speech let be consolations Suffer also speak have spoken mock on As is complaint man not be impatient Mark be astonished lay hand mouth Even remember am troubled horror taketh hold flesh Wherefore do wicked live Become old yea wax mighty power seed is established sight offspring eyes Their houses are safe fear is rod God them Their bull gendereth faileth not cow calveth casteth not calf They send forth little ones flock children dance They sing timbrel harp rejoice sound pipe They spend days prosperity moment go down Sheol And say unto God Depart desire not knowledge thy is Almighty serve profit have pray unto Lo prosperity is not hand counsel wicked is far me How oft is lamp wicked is put calamity cometh   God   distributeth sorrows anger are stubble wind chaff storm carrieth away   Ye say   God layeth iniquity children Let recompense unto know Let own eyes see destruction let drink wrath Almighty For careth house number months is cut Shall teach God knowledge Seeing judgeth are high One dieth full strength Being wholly ease quiet pails are full milk marrow bones is moistened And dieth bitterness soul never tasteth good They lie alike dust worm covereth them Behold know thoughts devices wherewith ye wrong me For ye say is house prince is tent wherein wicked dwelt Have ye not asked wayfaring men do ye not know evidences evil man is reserved day calamity are led forth day wrath declare way face repay hath done Yet be borne grave men keep watch tomb The clods valley be sweet unto men draw were innumerable him How then comfort ye vain Seeing answers remaineth   only   falsehood

Then answered Eliphaz Temanite said man be profitable unto God Surely is wise is profitable unto himself Is pleasure Almighty thou art righteous is gain     thou makest thy ways perfect Is thy fear     reproveth thee entereth thee judgment Is not thy wickedness great is there end thine iniquities For thou hast taken pledges thy brother nought stripped naked clothing Thou hast not given water weary drink thou hast withholden bread hungry But mighty man had earth honorable man dwelt it Thou hast sent widows away empty arms fatherless have been broken Therefore snares are round thee sudden fear troubleth thee Or darkness thou canst not see abundance waters cover not God height heaven behold height stars high are thou sayest doth God know judge thick darkness Thick clouds are covering so seeth not walketh vault heaven Wilt thou keep old way Which wicked men have trodden were snatched away time Whose foundation was poured stream Who said unto God Depart Almighty do filled houses good things counsel wicked is far me The righteous see are glad innocent laugh scorn Saying   Surely did rise are cut remnant fire hath consumed Acquaint now be peace Thereby good come unto thee Receive pray thee law mouth lay words thy heart If thou return Almighty thou shalt be built thou put unrighteousness far thy tents And lay thou   thy   treasure dust   gold   Ophir stones brooks Almighty be thy treasure precious silver unto thee For then shalt thou delight thyself Almighty shalt lift thy face God Thou shalt make thy prayer hear thee thou shalt pay thy vows Thou shalt also decree thing be established unto thee light shine thy ways When cast   thee   down thou shalt say   is   lifting humble person save He deliver   even   is not innocent Yea be delivered cleanness thy hands

Then Job answered said Even to day is complaint rebellious stroke is heavier groaning Oh knew find come even seat set cause order fill mouth arguments I know words answer understand say unto me Would contend greatness power Nay give heed upright reason So be delivered ever judge Behold go forward is not   there   backward not perceive left hand doth work not behold hideth right hand not see him But knoweth way take hath tried come forth gold My foot hath held fast steps way have kept turned not aside I have not gone back commandment lips have treasured words mouth more necessary food But is one   mind   turn soul desireth even doeth For performeth is appointed many such things are him Therefore am terrified presence consider am afraid him For God hath made heart faint Almighty hath terrified was not cut darkness did cover thick darkness face

are times not laid Almighty do not know see days are remove landmarks violently take away flocks feed them They drive ass fatherless take widow ox pledge They turn needy way poor earth hide themselves Behold wild asses desert go forth work seeking diligently food wilderness   yieldeth   bread children They cut provender field glean vintage wicked They lie night naked clothing have covering cold They are wet showers mountains embrace rock want shelter There are pluck fatherless breast take pledge poor     go naked clothing being hungry carry sheaves They make oil walls men tread     winepresses suffer thirst From populous city men groan soul wounded crieth God regardeth not folly These are rebel light know not ways thereof Nor abide paths thereof The murderer riseth light killeth poor needy night is thief The eye also adulterer waiteth twilight Saying No eye see disguiseth face In dark dig houses shut day time know not light For morning is thick darkness know terrors thick darkness Swiftly   pass   face waters portion is cursed earth turn not way vineyards Drought heat consume snow waters   doth   Sheol     have sinned The womb forget worm feed sweetly be no more remembered unrighteousness be broken tree He devoureth barren beareth not doeth not good widow Yet   God   preserveth mighty power riseth hath assurance life   God   giveth be security rest thereon eyes are ways They are exalted little while are gone Yea are brought low are taken way others are cut tops ears grain And be not so now prove liar make speech nothing worth

Then answered Bildad Shuhite said Dominion fear are maketh peace high places Is number armies not light arise then man be just God be clean is born woman Behold even moon hath brightness stars are not pure sight much less man is worm son man is worm

Then Job answered said How hast thou helped is power hast thou saved arm hath strength hast thou counselled hath wisdom plentifully declared sound knowledge hast thou uttered words spirit came forth thee are deceased tremble waters inhabitants thereof Sheol is naked   God   Abaddon hath covering He stretcheth north empty space hangeth earth nothing He bindeth waters thick clouds cloud is not rent them He incloseth face throne spreadeth cloud it He hath described boundary face waters confines light darkness The pillars heaven tremble are astonished rebuke He stirreth sea power understanding smiteth Rahab By Spirit heavens are garnished hand hath pierced swift serpent Lo are outskirts ways small whisper do hear thunder power understand

Job again took parable said God liveth hath taken right Almighty hath vexed soul life is yet whole spirit God is nostrils Surely lips not speak unrighteousness Neither tongue utter deceit Far be justify Till die not put mine integrity me My righteousness hold fast not let go heart not reproach   so long live Let mine enemy be wicked let riseth be unrighteous For is hope godless get gain God taketh away soul Will God hear cry trouble cometh delight Almighty call God times teach concerning hand God is Almighty not conceal Behold ye yourselves have seen then are ye altogether vain is portion wicked man God heritage oppressors receive Almighty children be multiplied is sword offspring not be satisfied bread Those remain be buried death widows make lamentation Though heap silver dust prepare raiment clay prepare just put innocent divide silver He buildeth house moth booth keeper maketh He lieth down rich not be gathered fathers   openeth eyes is not Terrors overtake waters A tempest stealeth away night The east wind carrieth away departeth sweepeth place For   God   hurl not spare fain flee hand Men clap hands hiss place

Surely is mine silver place gold refine Iron is taken earth copper is molten stone   Man   setteth end darkness searcheth furthest bound stones obscurity thick darkness He breaketh open shaft away men sojourn are forgotten foot hang afar men swing fro As earth cometh bread is turned were fire The stones are place sapphires hath dust path bird prey knoweth hath falcon eye seen proud beasts have not trodden fierce lion passed thereby He putteth forth hand flinty rock overturneth mountains roots He cutteth channels rocks eye seeth precious thing He bindeth streams trickle not thing is hid forth light But wisdom be found is place understanding Man knoweth not price thereof is found land living The deep saith is not sea saith is not me It not be gotten gold silver be weighed price thereof It not be valued gold Ophir precious onyx sapphire Gold glass not equal be exchanged jewels fine gold No mention be made coral crystal Yea price wisdom is rubies The topaz Ethiopia not equal be valued pure gold Whence then cometh wisdom is place understanding Seeing is hid eyes living kept close birds heavens Destruction Death say have heard rumor thereof ears God understandeth way thereof knoweth place thereof For looketh ends earth seeth whole heaven make weight wind Yea meteth waters measure When made decree rain way lightning thunder Then did see declare established yea searched unto man said Behold fear Lord is wisdom depart evil is understanding

Job again took parable said Oh were as months old days God watched lamp shined head light walked darkness was ripeness days friendship God was tent Almighty was yet children were steps were washed butter rock poured streams oil went forth gate city prepared seat street young men saw hid aged rose up stood princes refrained talking laid hand mouth voice nobles was hushed tongue cleaved roof mouth For ear heard   then blessed eye saw     gave witness delivered poor cried fatherless also had none help him The blessing was ready perish came caused widow heart sing joy I put righteousness clothed justice was robe diadem I was eyes blind feet was lame I was father needy cause knew not searched out And brake jaws unrighteous plucked prey teeth Then said die nest multiply days sand root is spread waters dew lieth night branch glory is fresh bow is renewed hand Unto men gave ear waited kept silence counsel After words spake not again speech distilled them And waited rain opened mouth wide     latter rain I smiled had confidence light countenance cast not down I chose way sat     chief dwelt king army one comforteth mourners

now are younger have derision Whose fathers disdained set dogs flock Yea strength hands whereto profit Men ripe age is perished They are gaunt want famine gnaw dry ground gloom wasteness desolation They pluck salt wort bushes roots broom are food They are driven forth midst   men   cry thief dwell frightful valleys holes earth rocks Among bushes bray nettles are gathered together are   children fools yea children base men were scourged land And now am become song Yea am byword them They stand aloof spare not spit face For hath loosed cord afflicted have cast bridle me Upon right hand rise rabble thrust aside feet cast ways destruction They mar path set forward calamity   Even   men have helper As wide breach come midst ruin roll      Terrors are turned chase mine honor wind welfare is passed away cloud And now soul is poured Days affliction have taken hold night season bones are pierced   pains   take rest By   God   great force is garment disfigured collar coat He hath cast mire am become dust ashes I cry unto thee thou dost not answer stand up thou gazest me Thou art turned be cruel thy hand thou persecutest me Thou liftest wind thou causest ride     thou dissolvest storm For know thou wilt bring death house appointed living Howbeit not one stretch hand fall calamity therefore cry help Did not weep was trouble Was not soul grieved needy looked good then evil came waited light came darkness My heart is troubled resteth not Days affliction are come me I go mourning sun stand assembly cry help I am brother jackals companion ostriches My skin is black   falleth   bones are burned heat Therefore is harp   turned   mourning pipe voice weep

made covenant mine eyes How then look virgin is portion God heritage Almighty high Is not calamity unrighteous disaster workers iniquity Doth not see ways number steps have walked falsehood foot hath hasted deceit Let be weighed even balance God know mine integrity step hath turned way heart walked mine eyes spot hath cleaved hands Then let sow let eat Yea let produce field be rooted out If heart hath been enticed woman have laid wait neighbor door Then let wife grind let others bow upon her For were heinous crime Yea were iniquity be punished judges is fire consumeth unto Destruction root mine increase If have despised cause man servant maid servant contended then do God riseth visiteth answer Did not made womb make did not one fashion womb have withheld poor     desire have caused refuge him For is God save Jehovah is rock God God girdeth strength maketh way perfect maketh feet hinds   feet   setteth high places He hands war mine arms do bend bow brass Thou hast also given shield thy salvation thy right hand hath holden thy gentleness hath made great Thou hast enlarged steps feet have not slipped I pursue mine enemies overtake turn again are consumed I smite not be able
