son attend unto wisdom Incline thine ear understanding thou mayest preserve discretion thy lips keep knowledge For lips strange woman drop honey mouth is smoother oil end is bitter wormwood Sharp two edged sword Her feet go down death steps take hold Sheol findeth not level path life ways are unstable     knoweth   not Now therefore     sons hearken depart not words mouth Remove thy way far come not nigh door house Lest thou give thine honor others thy years cruel Lest strangers be filled thy strength thy labors   be   house alien thou mourn thy latter end thy flesh thy body are consumed say have hated instruction heart despised reproof have obeyed voice teachers inclined mine ear instructed was well nigh evil midst assembly congregation Drink waters thine own cistern running waters thine own well Should thy springs be dispersed abroad streams water streets Let be alone not strangers thee Let thy fountain be blessed rejoice wife thy youth     loving hind pleasant doe Let breasts satisfy thee times be thou ravished always love For shouldest thou son be ravished strange woman embrace bosom foreigner ways man are eyes Jehovah maketh level paths His own iniquities take wicked be holden cords sin He die lack instruction greatness folly go astray

son thou art become surety thy neighbor thou hast stricken thy hands stranger Thou art snared words thy mouth Thou art taken words thy mouth Do now son deliver Seeing thou art come hand thy neighbor Go humble thyself importune thy neighbor Give not sleep thine eyes slumber thine eyelids Deliver roe hand   hunter   bird hand fowler Go ant thou sluggard Consider ways be wise Which having chief Overseer ruler Provideth bread summer gathereth food harvest How long wilt thou sleep O sluggard wilt thou arise thy sleep     little sleep little slumber little folding hands sleep So thy poverty come robber thy want armed man A worthless person man iniquity Is walketh perverse mouth winketh eyes speaketh feet maketh signs fingers heart is perverseness deviseth evil continually soweth discord Therefore calamity come suddenly sudden be broken are six things Jehovah hateth Yea seven are abomination Haughty eyes lying tongue hands shed innocent blood A heart deviseth wicked purposes Feet are swift running mischief A false witness uttereth lies soweth discord brethren My son keep commandment thy father forsake not law thy mother Bind continually thy heart Tie thy neck When thou walkest lead thee thou sleepest watch thee thou awakest talk thee For commandment is lamp law is light reproofs instruction are way life keep thee evil woman flattery foreigner tongue Lust not beauty thy heart let take thee eyelids For account harlot   man is brought   piece bread adulteress hunteth precious life Can man take fire bosom clothes not be burned one walk hot coals feet not be scorched So goeth neighbor wife Whosoever toucheth not be unpunished Men do not despise thief steal satisfy is hungry be found restore sevenfold give substance house He committeth adultery woman is void understanding doeth destroy own soul Wounds dishonor get reproach not be wiped away For jealousy is rage man not spare day vengeance He not regard ransom rest content thou givest many gifts

son keep words lay commandments thee Keep commandments live law apple thine thy fingers Write tablet thy heart Say unto wisdom Thou art sister call understanding   thy   kinswoman keep thee strange woman foreigner flattereth words For window house looked forth lattice beheld simple ones discerned youths A young man void understanding Passing street corner went way house twilight evening day middle night darkness And behold met woman attire harlot wily heart is clamorous wilful feet not house Now is streets now broad places lieth wait corner caught kissed     impudent face said unto Sacrifices peace offerings are day have paid vows Therefore came forth meet thee Diligently seek thy face have found thee I have spread couch carpets tapestry striped cloths yarn Egypt I have perfumed bed myrrh aloes cinnamon Come let take fill love morning Let solace man is not home is gone long journey hath taken bag money come home full moon With much fair speech causeth yield flattering lips forceth along He goeth straightway ox goeth slaughter   one   fetters correction fool Till arrow strike liver bird hasteth snare knoweth not is life Now therefore     sons hearken attend words mouth Let not thy heart decline ways Go not astray paths For hath cast down many wounded Yea slain are mighty host Her house is way Sheol Going chambers death

Doth not wisdom cry understanding put forth voice top high places way paths meet standeth gates entry city coming doors crieth aloud O men call voice is sons men O ye simple understand prudence fools be understanding heart Hear speak excellent things opening lips be right things For mouth utter truth wickedness is abomination words mouth are righteousness is nothing crooked perverse them They are plain understandeth right find knowledge Receive instruction not silver knowledge rather choice gold For wisdom is better rubies things be desired are not be compared unto it I wisdom have made prudence dwelling find knowledge     discretion The fear Jehovah is hate evil Pride arrogancy evil way perverse mouth do hate Counsel is mine sound knowledge am understanding have might By kings reign princes decree princes rule nobles   even   judges earth I love love seek diligently find me Riches honor are Yea   durable wealth righteousness My fruit is better gold yea fine gold revenue choice silver I walk way righteousness midst paths justice cause love inherit substance fill treasuries Jehovah possessed beginning way works old I was set everlasting beginning earth was When were depths was brought forth were fountains abounding mountains were settled hills was brought forth yet had not made earth fields beginning dust world When established heavens was there set circle face deep made firm skies fountains deep became strong gave sea bound waters not transgress commandment marked foundations earth Then was     master workman was daily     delight Rejoicing always Rejoicing habitable earth delight was sons men Now therefore     sons hearken blessed are keep ways Hear instruction be wise refuse not Blessed is man heareth Watching daily gates Waiting posts doors For whoso findeth findeth life obtain favor Jehovah But sinneth wrongeth own soul hate love death

Wisdom hath builded house hath hewn seven pillars hath killed beasts hath mingled wine hath also furnished table hath sent forth maidens crieth highest places city Whoso is simple let turn hither is void understanding saith Come eat ye bread drink wine have mingled Leave ye simple ones live walk way understanding He correcteth scoffer getteth reviling reproveth wicked man   getteth blot Reprove not scoffer hate thee Reprove wise man love thee Give   instruction   wise man be yet wiser Teach righteous man increase learning The fear Jehovah is beginning wisdom knowledge Holy One is understanding For thy days be multiplied years thy life be increased If thou art wise thou art wise thyself thou scoffest thou alone shalt it The foolish woman is clamorous is   simple knoweth sitteth door house seat high places city call pass go right ways Whoso is simple let turn hither is void understanding saith Stolen waters are sweet bread   eaten   secret is knoweth not dead are there guests are depths Sheol

proverbs Solomon wise son maketh glad father foolish son is heaviness mother Treasures wickedness profit nothing righteousness delivereth death Jehovah not suffer soul righteous famish thrusteth away desire wicked He becometh poor worketh slack hand hand diligent maketh rich He gathereth summer is wise son   sleepeth harvest is son causeth shame Blessings are head righteous violence covereth mouth wicked The memory righteous is blessed name wicked rot The wise heart receive commandments prating fool fall He walketh uprightly walketh surely perverteth ways be known He winketh eye causeth sorrow prating fool fall The mouth righteous is fountain life violence covereth mouth wicked Hatred stirreth strifes love covereth transgressions In lips hath discernment wisdom is found rod is back is void understanding Wise men lay knowledge mouth foolish is present destruction The rich man wealth is strong city destruction poor is poverty The labor righteous   tendeth   life increase wicked sin He is way life heedeth correction forsaketh reproof erreth He hideth hatred is lying lips uttereth slander is fool In multitude words wanteth not transgression refraineth lips doeth wisely The tongue righteous is     choice silver heart wicked is little worth The lips righteous feed many foolish die lack understanding The blessing Jehovah maketh rich addeth sorrow therewith It is sport fool do wickedness   so is   wisdom man understanding The fear wicked come desire righteous be granted When whirlwind passeth wicked is more righteous is everlasting foundation As vinegar teeth smoke eyes So is sluggard send him The fear Jehovah prolongeth days years wicked be shortened The hope righteous   be   gladness expectation wicked perish The way Jehovah is stronghold upright is destruction workers iniquity The righteous never be removed wicked not dwell land The mouth righteous bringeth forth wisdom perverse tongue be cut off The lips righteous know is acceptable mouth wicked   speaketh   perverseness

false balance is abomination Jehovah just weight is delight When pride cometh then cometh shame lowly is wisdom The integrity upright guide perverseness treacherous destroy them Riches profit not day wrath righteousness delivereth death The righteousness perfect direct way wicked fall own wickedness The righteousness upright deliver treacherous be taken own iniquity When wicked man dieth     expectation perish hope iniquity perisheth The righteous is delivered trouble wicked cometh stead With mouth godless man destroyeth neighbor knowledge righteous be delivered When goeth well righteous city rejoiceth wicked perish is blessing upright city is exalted is overthrown mouth wicked He despiseth neighbor is void wisdom man understanding holdeth peace He goeth about tale bearer revealeth secrets is faithful spirit concealeth matter Where wise guidance is people falleth multitude counsellors is safety He is surety stranger smart hateth suretyship is secure A gracious woman obtaineth honor violent men obtain riches The merciful man doeth good own soul is cruel own flesh The wicked earneth deceitful wages soweth righteousness   hath   sure reward He is stedfast righteousness   attain   unto life pursueth evil   doeth   own death They are perverse heart are abomination Jehovah such are perfect     way are delight   Though   hand   join   hand evil man not be unpunished seed righteous be delivered     ring gold swine snout   So is fair woman is discretion The desire righteous is only good     expectation wicked is is scattereth increaseth yet more is withholdeth more is meet   tendeth   only want The liberal soul be made fat watereth be watered also himself He withholdeth grain people curse blessing be head selleth it He diligently seeketh good seeketh favor searcheth evil come unto him He trusteth riches fall righteous flourish green leaf He troubleth own house inherit wind foolish be servant wise heart The fruit righteous is tree life is wise winneth souls Behold righteous be recompensed earth much more wicked sinner

Whoso loveth correction loveth knowledge hateth reproof is brutish A good man obtain favor Jehovah man wicked devices condemn A man not be established wickedness root righteous not be moved A worthy woman is crown husband maketh ashamed is rottenness bones The thoughts righteous are just   counsels wicked are deceit The words wicked are lying wait blood mouth upright deliver them The wicked are overthrown are not house righteous stand A man be commended according wisdom is perverse heart be despised Better is is lightly esteemed hath servant Than honoreth lacketh bread A righteous man regardeth life beast tender mercies wicked are cruel He tilleth land have plenty bread followeth vain   persons   is void understanding The wicked desireth net evil men root righteous yieldeth   fruit    In transgression lips is snare evil man righteous come trouble A man be satisfied good fruit mouth doings man hands be rendered him The way fool is right own eyes is wise hearkeneth counsel A fool vexation is presently known prudent man concealeth shame He uttereth truth showeth forth righteousness false witness is speaketh rashly piercings sword tongue wise is health The lip truth be established ever lying tongue is moment Deceit is heart devise evil counsellors peace is joy There mischief happen righteous wicked be filled evil Lying lips are abomination Jehovah deal truly are delight A prudent man concealeth knowledge heart fools proclaimeth foolishness The hand diligent bear rule slothful be put taskwork Heaviness heart man maketh stoop good word maketh glad The righteous is guide neighbor way wicked causeth err The slothful man roasteth not took hunting precious substance men   is   diligent In way righteousness is life pathway thereof is death

wise son   heareth   father instruction scoffer heareth not rebuke A man eat good fruit mouth soul treacherous   eat   violence He guardeth mouth keepeth life   openeth wide lips have destruction The soul sluggard desireth hath nothing soul diligent be made fat A righteous man hateth lying wicked man is loathsome cometh shame Righteousness guardeth is upright way wickedness sinner There is maketh rich yet hath nothing is maketh poor yet hath great wealth The ransom man life is riches poor heareth threatening The light righteous rejoiceth lamp wicked be put out By pride cometh only contention well advised is wisdom Wealth gotten vanity be diminished gathereth labor have increase Hope deferred maketh heart sick desire cometh is tree life Whoso despiseth word bringeth destruction feareth commandment be rewarded The law wise is fountain life one depart snares death Good understanding giveth favor way transgressor is hard Every prudent man worketh knowledge fool flaunteth     folly A wicked messenger falleth evil faithful ambassador is health Poverty shame   be   refuseth correction regardeth reproof be honored The desire accomplished is sweet soul is abomination fools depart evil Walk wise men thou shalt be wise companion fools smart it Evil pursueth sinners righteous be recompensed good A good man leaveth inheritance children children wealth sinner is laid righteous Much food   is   tillage poor is is destroyed reason injustice He spareth rod hateth son loveth chasteneth betimes The righteous eateth satisfying soul belly wicked want

wise woman buildeth house foolish plucketh own hands He walketh uprightness feareth Jehovah is perverse ways despiseth mouth foolish is rod     pride lips wise preserve them Where oxen are crib is clean much increase is strength ox A faithful witness not lie false witness uttereth lies A scoffer seeketh wisdom   findeth   not knowledge is easy hath understanding Go presence foolish man thou shalt not perceive     lips knowledge The wisdom prudent is understand way folly fools is deceit A trespass offering mocketh fools upright is good will The heart knoweth own bitterness stranger doth not intermeddle joy The house wicked be overthrown tent upright flourish There is way seemeth right man end thereof are ways death Even laughter heart is sorrowful end mirth is heaviness The backslider heart be filled own ways good man   be satisfied himself The simple believeth word prudent man looketh well going A wise man feareth departeth evil fool beareth insolently is confident He is soon angry deal foolishly man wicked devices is hated The simple inherit folly prudent are crowned knowledge The evil bow down good wicked gates righteous The poor is hated even own neighbor rich hath many friends He despiseth neighbor sinneth hath pity poor happy is he Do not err devise evil mercy truth   be   devise good In labor is profit talk lips   tendeth   only penury The crown wise is riches   folly fools is   only   folly A true witness delivereth souls uttereth lies   causeth   deceit In fear Jehovah is strong confidence children have place refuge The fear Jehovah is fountain life one depart snares death In multitude people is king glory want people is destruction prince He is slow anger is great understanding is hasty spirit folly A tranquil heart is life flesh envy is rottenness bones He oppresseth poor reproacheth Maker hath mercy needy honoreth him The wicked is thrust down evil doing righteous hath refuge death Wisdom resteth heart hath understanding   is   inward part fools is made known Righteousness exalteth nation sin is reproach people The king favor is servant dealeth wisely wrath be     causeth shame

soft answer turneth away wrath grievous word stirreth anger The tongue wise uttereth knowledge aright mouth fools poureth folly The eyes Jehovah are place Keeping watch evil good A gentle tongue is tree life perverseness therein is breaking spirit A fool despiseth father correction regardeth reproof getteth prudence In house righteous is much treasure revenues wicked is trouble The lips wise disperse knowledge heart foolish   doeth   not so The sacrifice wicked is abomination Jehovah prayer upright is delight The way wicked is abomination Jehovah loveth followeth righteousness There is grievous correction forsaketh way   hateth reproof die Sheol Abaddon are Jehovah much more then hearts children men scoffer loveth not be reproved not go wise A glad heart maketh cheerful countenance sorrow heart spirit is broken The heart hath understanding seeketh knowledge mouth fools feedeth days afflicted are evil is cheerful heart   hath   continual feast Better is little fear Jehovah Than great treasure trouble therewith Better is dinner herbs love is stalled ox hatred therewith A wrathful man stirreth contention is slow anger appeaseth strife The way sluggard is hedge thorns path upright is made highway A wise son maketh glad father foolish man despiseth mother Folly is joy is void wisdom man understanding maketh straight going Where is counsel purposes are disappointed multitude counsellors are established A man hath joy answer mouth word due season good is wise way life   goeth   upward depart Sheol beneath Jehovah root house proud establish border widow Evil devices are abomination Jehovah pleasant words are   pure He is greedy gain own house hateth live The heart righteous studieth answer mouth wicked poureth evil things Jehovah is far wicked heareth prayer righteous The light eyes rejoiceth heart   good tidings make bones fat The ear hearkeneth reproof life Shall abide wise He refuseth correction despiseth own soul hearkeneth reproof getteth understanding The fear Jehovah is instruction wisdom honor   goeth   humility

plans heart belong man answer tongue is Jehovah All ways man are clean own eyes Jehovah weigheth spirits Commit thy works unto Jehovah thy purposes be established Jehovah hath made everything own end Yea even wicked day evil Every one is proud heart is abomination Jehovah     hand   join   hand not be unpunished By mercy truth iniquity is atoned fear Jehovah men depart man ways please Jehovah maketh even enemies be peace him Better is little righteousness Than great revenues injustice A man heart deviseth way Jehovah directeth steps A divine sentence is lips king mouth not transgress judgment A just balance scales are Jehovah weights bag are work It is abomination kings commit wickedness throne is established righteousness Righteous lips are delight kings love speaketh right The wrath king is     messengers death wise man pacify it In light king countenance is life favor is cloud latter rain How much better is get wisdom gold Yea get understanding is rather be chosen silver The highway upright is depart evil keepeth way soul Pride   goeth   destruction haughty spirit fall Better is be lowly spirit poor Than divide spoil proud He giveth heed word find good whoso trusteth Jehovah happy is he The wise heart be called prudent sweetness lips increaseth learning Understanding is well spring life hath correction fools is     folly The heart wise instructeth mouth addeth learning lips Pleasant words are     honeycomb Sweet soul health bones There is way seemeth right man end thereof are ways death The appetite laboring man laboreth mouth urgeth   thereto    A worthless man deviseth mischief lips is scorching fire A perverse man scattereth abroad strife whisperer separateth chief friends A man violence neighbor leadeth way is not good He shutteth eyes   is   devise perverse things compresseth lips bringeth evil pass The hoary head is crown glory be found way righteousness He is slow anger is better mighty ruleth spirit taketh city The lot is cast lap whole disposing thereof is Jehovah

Better is dry morsel quietness therewith Than house full feasting strife A servant dealeth wisely have rule son causeth shame have part inheritance brethren The refining pot is silver furnace gold Jehovah trieth hearts An evil doer giveth heed wicked lips     liar giveth ear mischievous tongue Whoso mocketh poor reproacheth Maker     is glad calamity not be unpunished Children children are crown old men glory children are fathers Excellent speech becometh not fool Much less do lying lips prince A bribe is     precious stone eyes hath turneth prospereth He covereth transgression seeketh love harpeth matter separateth chief friends A rebuke entereth deeper one hath understanding Than hundred stripes fool An evil man seeketh only rebellion cruel messenger be sent bear robbed whelps meet man Rather fool folly Whoso rewardeth evil good Evil not depart house The beginning strife is     one letteth water Therefore leave contention is quarrelling He justifieth wicked condemneth righteous are abomination Jehovah Wherefore is there price hand fool buy wisdom Seeing hath understanding friend loveth times brother is born adversity A man void understanding striketh hands surety presence neighbor He loveth transgression loveth strife raiseth high gate seeketh destruction He hath wayward heart findeth good hath perverse tongue falleth mischief He begetteth fool   doeth   sorrow father fool hath joy A cheerful heart is good medicine broken spirit drieth bones A wicked man receiveth bribe bosom pervert ways justice Wisdom is face hath understanding eyes fool are ends earth A foolish son is grief father bitterness bare him Also punish righteous is not good   Nor   smite noble     spareth words hath knowledge is cool spirit is man understanding Even fool holdeth peace is counted wise shutteth lips is   esteemed   prudent

separateth seeketh   own   desire rageth sound wisdom A fool hath delight understanding only heart reveal itself When wicked cometh cometh also contempt ignominy   cometh reproach The words man mouth are     deep waters wellspring wisdom is     flowing brook To respect person wicked is not good   Nor   turn righteous judgment A fool lips enter contention mouth calleth stripes A fool mouth is destruction lips are snare soul The words whisperer are dainty morsels go down innermost parts He also is slack work Is brother is destroyer The name Jehovah is strong tower righteous runneth is safe The rich man wealth is strong city high wall own imagination Before destruction heart man is haughty honor   goeth   humility He giveth answer heareth is folly shame unto him The spirit man sustain infirmity broken spirit bear heart prudent getteth knowledge ear wise seeketh knowledge A man gift maketh room bringeth great men He pleadeth cause first   seemeth   just neighbor cometh searcheth lot causeth contentions cease parteth mighty A brother offended   is harder be won   strong city   such   contentions are bars castle A man belly be filled fruit mouth increase lips be satisfied Death life are power tongue love eat fruit thereof Whoso findeth wife findeth good thing obtaineth favor Jehovah The poor useth entreaties rich answereth roughly He maketh many friends   doeth   own destruction is friend sticketh closer brother

Better is poor walketh integrity Than is perverse lips is fool Also soul be knowledge is not good hasteth feet sinneth The foolishness man subverteth way heart fretteth Jehovah Wealth addeth many friends poor is separated friend A false witness not be unpunished uttereth lies not escape Many entreat favor liberal man man is friend giveth brethren poor do hate much more do friends go far pursueth     words     are gone He getteth wisdom loveth own soul keepeth understanding find good A false witness not be unpunished uttereth lies perish Delicate living is not seemly fool Much less servant have rule princes The discretion man maketh slow anger is glory pass transgression The king wrath is roaring lion favor is dew grass A foolish son is calamity father contentions wife are continual dropping House riches are inheritance fathers prudent wife is Jehovah Slothfulness casteth deep sleep idle soul suffer hunger He keepeth commandment keepeth soul   is careless ways die He hath pity poor lendeth Jehovah good deed pay again Chasten thy son seeing is hope set not thy heart destruction A man great wrath bear penalty thou deliver     thou do yet again Hear counsel receive instruction thou mayest be wise thy latter are many devices man heart counsel Jehovah stand That maketh man be desired is kindness poor man is better liar The fear Jehovah   tendeth   life   hath   abide satisfied not be visited evil The sluggard hand dish not so much bring mouth again Smite scoffer simple learn prudence reprove one hath understanding     understand knowledge He doeth violence father chaseth mother Is son causeth shame bringeth reproach Cease son hear instruction Only   err words knowledge A worthless witness mocketh justice mouth wicked swalloweth iniquity Judgments are prepared scoffers stripes back fools

Wine is mocker strong drink brawler whosoever erreth thereby is not wise The terror king is roaring lion provoketh anger sinneth     own life It is honor man keep aloof strife fool be quarrelling The sluggard not plow reason winter beg harvest have nothing Counsel heart man is     deep water man understanding draw men proclaim one own kindness faithful man find righteous man walketh integrity Blessed are children him A king sitteth throne judgment Scattereth away evil eyes Who say have made heart clean am pure sin Diverse weights diverse measures Both are abomination Jehovah Even child maketh known doings Whether work be pure be right The hearing ear seeing eye Jehovah hath made even them Love not sleep let come poverty Open thine eyes     thou shalt be satisfied bread It is bad is bad saith buyer is gone way then is gold abundance rubies lips knowledge are precious jewel Take garment is surety stranger hold pledge   is surety   foreigners Bread falsehood is sweet man mouth be filled gravel Every purpose is established counsel wise guidance make thou war He goeth about tale bearer revealeth secrets Therefore company not openeth wide lips Whoso curseth father mother lamp be put blackness darkness An inheritance   be   gotten hastily beginning end thereof not be blessed Say not thou recompense evil Wait Jehovah save thee Diverse weights are abomination Jehovah false balance is not good A man goings are Jehovah then man understand way is snare man rashly say   is   holy vows make inquiry A wise king winnoweth wicked bringeth   threshing    wheel them The spirit man is lamp Jehovah Searching innermost parts Kindness truth preserve king throne is upholden kindness The glory young men is strength beauty old men is hoary head Stripes wound cleanse away evil strokes   reach   innermost parts

king heart is hand Jehovah watercourses turneth will Every way man is right own eyes Jehovah weigheth hearts To do righteousness justice Is more acceptable Jehovah sacrifice A high look proud heart   Even   lamp wicked is sin The thoughts diligent   tend   only plenteousness one is hasty   hasteth   only want The getting treasures lying tongue Is vapor driven fro seek death The violence wicked sweep away refuse do justice The way is laden guilt is exceeding crooked pure work is right It is better dwell corner housetop Than contentious woman wide house The soul wicked desireth evil neighbor findeth favor eyes When scoffer is punished simple is made wise wise is instructed receiveth knowledge The righteous man considereth house wicked   How   wicked are overthrown     ruin Whoso stoppeth ears cry poor also cry not be heard A gift secret pacifieth anger present bosom strong wrath It is joy righteous do justice is destruction workers iniquity The man wandereth way understanding Shall rest assembly dead He loveth pleasure be poor man loveth wine oil not be rich The wicked is ransom righteous treacherous   cometh   stead upright It is better dwell desert land Than contentious fretful woman There is precious treasure oil dwelling wise foolish man swalloweth followeth righteousness kindness Findeth life righteousness honor A wise man scaleth city mighty bringeth strength confidence thereof Whoso keepeth mouth tongue Keepeth soul troubles The proud haughty man scoffer is name worketh arrogance pride The desire sluggard killeth hands refuse labor There is coveteth greedily day long righteous giveth withholdeth not The sacrifice wicked is abomination much more bringeth wicked mind false witness perish man heareth speak so endure A wicked man hardeneth face upright establisheth ways There is wisdom understanding Nor counsel Jehovah The horse is prepared day battle victory is Jehovah

good   name is rather be chosen great riches     loving favor rather silver gold The rich poor meet together Jehovah is maker all A prudent man seeth evil hideth simple pass suffer it The reward humility     fear Jehovah   Is   riches honor life Thorns     snares are way perverse keepeth soul be far them Train child way go even is old not depart it The rich ruleth poor borrower is servant lender He soweth iniquity reap calamity rod wrath fail He hath bountiful eye be blessed giveth bread poor Cast scoffer contention go Yea strife ignominy cease He loveth pureness heart   grace lips king be friend The eyes Jehovah preserve   hath   knowledge overthroweth words treacherous man The sluggard saith is lion be slain streets The mouth strange women is deep pit is abhorred Jehovah fall therein Foolishness is bound heart child   rod correction drive far him He oppresseth poor increase   gain       giveth rich   come   only want Incline thine ear hear words wise apply thy heart knowledge For is pleasant thing thou keep thee be established together thy thy trust be Jehovah have made     known thee day even thee Have not written unto thee excellent things counsels knowledge make thee know certainty words truth thou mayest carry back words truth send thee Rob not poor is poor afflicted gate Jehovah plead cause despoil life despoil them Make friendship man is given anger wrathful man thou shalt not go Lest thou learn ways get snare thy soul Be not one strike hands   Or   are sureties debts If thou hast not wherewith pay take thy bed thee Remove not ancient landmark Which thy fathers have set Seest man diligent business stand kings not stand mean men

thou sittest eat ruler Consider diligently is thee put knife thy throat thou be man given appetite Be not desirous dainties Seeing are deceitful food Weary not be rich Cease thine own wisdom Wilt thou set thine eyes is not   riches   certainly make wings eagle flieth heaven Eat thou not bread hath evil eye Neither desire thou dainties thinketh so is Eat drink saith thee heart is not thee The morsel thou hast eaten shalt thou vomit lose thy sweet words Speak not hearing fool despise wisdom thy not ancient landmark enter not fields fatherless Redeemer is strong plead cause thee Apply thy heart unto instruction thine ears words knowledge Withhold not correction child     thou beat rod not die Thou shalt beat rod shalt deliver soul Sheol My son thy heart be wise My heart be glad even mine Yea heart rejoice thy lips speak right things Let not thy heart envy sinners   be thou   fear Jehovah day long surely is reward thy hope not be cut off Hear thou son be wise guide thy heart way Be not winebibbers gluttonous eaters flesh drunkard glutton come poverty drowsiness clothe   man   rags Hearken unto thy father begat thee despise not thy mother is truth sell not Yea   wisdom instruction understanding The father righteous greatly rejoice begetteth wise child have joy him Let thy father thy mother be glad let bare thee rejoice My son give thy heart let thine eyes delight ways For harlot is deep ditch foreign woman is narrow pit Yea lieth wait robber increaseth treacherous men Who hath woe hath sorrow hath contentions hath complaining hath wounds cause hath redness eyes tarry long wine go seek mixed wine Look not thou wine is red sparkleth cup goeth smoothly last biteth serpent stingeth adder Thine eyes behold strange things thy heart utter perverse things Yea shalt be lieth down midst sea lieth top mast They have stricken shalt thou say   was not hurt have beaten felt not awake seek yet again

Be not thou envious evil men desire be heart studieth oppression lips talk mischief Through wisdom is house builded understanding is established knowledge are chambers filled precious pleasant riches A wise man is strong Yea man knowledge increaseth might For wise guidance thou shalt make thy war multitude counsellors is safety Wisdom is too high fool openeth not mouth gate He deviseth do evil Men call mischief maker The thought foolishness is sin scoffer is abomination men If thou faint day adversity Thy strength is small Deliver are carried away unto death are ready be slain see thou hold back If thou sayest Behold knew not Doth not weigheth hearts consider keepeth thy soul doth not know not render man according work My son eat thou honey is good droppings honeycomb are sweet thy taste So shalt thou know wisdom be unto thy soul thou hast found then there be reward thy hope not be cut off Lay not wait O wicked man habitation righteous Destroy not resting place righteous man falleth seven times riseth again wicked are overthrown calamity Rejoice not thine enemy falleth let not thy heart be glad is overthrown Lest Jehovah see displease turn wrath him Fret not evil doers be thou envious wicked be reward evil man lamp wicked be put out My son fear thou Jehovah king   company not are given change calamity rise suddenly destruction knoweth also are   sayings   wise have respect persons judgment is not good He saith wicked Thou art righteous Peoples curse nations abhor rebuke     be delight good blessing come them He kisseth lips Who giveth right answer Prepare thy work make ready thee field afterwards build thy house Be not witness thy neighbor cause deceive not thy not do so hath done render man according work I went field sluggard vineyard man void understanding lo was grown thorns face thereof was covered nettles stone wall thereof was broken down Then beheld considered well saw received instruction   Yet   little sleep little slumber little folding hands sleep So thy poverty come robber thy want armed man

also are proverbs Solomon men Hezekiah king Judah copied out It is glory God conceal thing glory kings is search matter As heavens height earth depth heart kings is unsearchable Take away dross silver there cometh forth vessel refiner Take wicked     king throne be established righteousness Put not forward presence king stand not place great men better is be said unto thee Come up hither Than thou shouldest be put lower presence prince Whom thine eyes have seen Go not forth hastily strive Lest   thou know not   do end thereof thy neighbor hath put thee shame Debate thy cause thy neighbor     disclose not secret Lest heareth revile thee thine infamy turn not away A word fitly spoken Is     apples gold network silver     ear ring gold ornament fine gold   So is wise reprover obedient ear As cold snow time harvest   So is faithful messenger send refresheth soul masters     clouds wind rain   So is boasteth gifts falsely By long forbearing is ruler persuaded soft tongue bone Hast thou found honey eat so much is sufficient thee Lest thou be filled therewith vomit it Let thy foot be seldom thy neighbor house Lest be weary thee hate thee A man beareth false witness neighbor Is maul sword sharp arrow Confidence unfaithful man time trouble Is   broken tooth foot joint     one taketh garment cold weather     vinegar soda So is singeth songs heavy heart If thine enemy be hungry give bread eat be thirsty give water drink thou wilt heap coals fire head Jehovah reward thee The north wind bringeth forth rain So doth backbiting tongue angry countenance It is better dwell corner housetop Than contentious woman wide house     cold waters thirsty soul So is good news far country     troubled fountain corrupted spring   So is righteous man giveth way wicked It is not good eat much honey So   men   search own glory is grievous He spirit is restraint Is   city is broken down walls

snow summer rain harvest So honor is not seemly fool As sparrow wandering swallow flying curse is causeless alighteth not A whip horse bridle ass rod back fools Answer not fool according folly Lest thou also be unto him Answer fool according folly Lest be wise own conceit He sendeth message hand fool Cutteth   own   feet     drinketh damage The legs lame hang loose So is parable mouth fools As one bindeth stone sling So is giveth honor fool     thorn goeth hand drunkard So is parable mouth fools     archer woundeth So is hireth fool hireth pass by As dog returneth vomit   So is fool repeateth folly Seest thou man wise own conceit is more hope fool him The sluggard saith is lion way lion is streets     door turneth hinges sluggard bed The sluggard hand dish wearieth bring again mouth The sluggard is wiser own conceit Than seven men render reason He passeth     vexeth strife belonging not Is     one taketh dog ears As madman casteth firebrands Arrows death So is man deceiveth neighbor saith Am not sport lack wood fire goeth is whisperer contention ceaseth     coals are hot embers wood fire So is contentious man inflame strife The words whisperer are dainty morsels go down innermost parts Fervent lips wicked heart Are     earthen vessel overlaid silver dross He hateth dissembleth lips layeth deceit speaketh fair believe not are seven abominations heart   hatred cover guile wickedness be openly showed assembly Whoso diggeth pit fall therein rolleth stone return him A lying tongue hateth hath wounded flattering mouth worketh ruin

Boast not to morrow thou knowest not day bring forth Let man praise thee not thine own mouth A stranger not thine own lips A stone is heavy sand weighty fool vexation is heavier both Wrath is cruel anger is overwhelming is able stand jealousy Better is open rebuke Than love is hidden Faithful are wounds friend kisses enemy are profuse The full soul loatheth honeycomb hungry soul bitter thing is bird wandereth nest So is man wandereth place Oil perfume rejoice heart doth sweetness man friend   cometh   hearty counsel Thine own friend thy father friend forsake not go not thy brother house day thy calamity Better is neighbor is brother far off My son be wise make heart glad answer reproacheth me A prudent man seeth evil     hideth   simple pass     suffer it Take garment is surety stranger hold pledge   is surety   foreign woman He blesseth friend loud voice rising early morning be counted curse him A continual dropping very rainy day contentious woman are alike restrain restraineth wind right hand encountereth sharpeneth iron man sharpeneth countenance friend Whoso keepeth fig tree eat fruit thereof regardeth master be honored As water face   answereth face heart man man Sheol Abaddon are never satisfied eyes man are never satisfied The refining pot is silver furnace gold man is   tried   praise Though thou shouldest bray fool mortar pestle bruised grain not foolishness depart him Be thou diligent know state thy flocks     look well thy herds riches are not ever doth crown endure generations hay is carried tender grass showeth herbs mountains are gathered in The lambs are thy clothing goats are price field   be   goats milk enough thy food food thy household maintenance thy maidens

wicked flee man pursueth righteous are bold lion For transgression land many are princes thereof men understanding     knowledge state   thereof   be prolonged A needy man oppresseth poor Is     sweeping rain leaveth food They forsake law praise wicked such keep law contend them Evil men understand not justice seek Jehovah understand things Better is poor walketh integrity Than is perverse     ways be rich Whoso keepeth law is wise son is companion gluttons shameth father He augmenteth substance interest increase Gathereth hath pity poor He turneth away ear hearing law Even prayer is abomination Whoso causeth upright go evil way fall own pit perfect inherit good The rich man is wise own conceit poor hath understanding searcheth out When righteous triumph is great glory wicked rise men hide themselves He covereth transgressions not prosper whoso confesseth forsaketh obtain mercy Happy is man feareth alway hardeneth heart fall mischief     roaring lion ranging bear   So is wicked ruler poor people The prince lacketh understanding is also great oppressor   hateth covetousness prolong days A man is laden blood person Shall flee pit Let man stay him Whoso walketh uprightly be delivered is perverse     ways fall once He tilleth land have plenty bread followeth vain   persons   have poverty enough A faithful man abound blessings maketh haste be rich not be unpunished To have respect persons is not good man transgress piece bread he hath evil eye hasteth riches knoweth not want come him He rebuketh man afterward find more favor flattereth tongue Whoso robbeth father mother saith is transgression same is companion destroyer He is greedy spirit stirreth strife putteth trust Jehovah be made fat He trusteth own heart is fool whoso wisely be delivered He giveth poor not lack hideth eyes have many curse When wicked rise men hide perish righteous increase

being often reproved hardeneth neck Shall suddenly be destroyed remedy When righteous are increased people rejoice wicked man beareth rule people sigh Whoso loveth wisdom rejoiceth father keepeth company harlots wasteth     substance The king justice land exacteth gifts it A man flattereth neighbor Spreadeth net steps In transgression evil man is snare righteous doth sing rejoice The righteous taketh knowledge cause poor wicked hath not understanding know      Scoffers set city flame wise men turn wise man hath controversy foolish man be angry laugh be rest The bloodthirsty hate is perfect upright seek life A fool anger wise man keepeth back stilleth it If ruler hearkeneth falsehood servants are wicked The poor man oppressor meet together Jehovah lighteneth eyes both The king faithfully judgeth poor throne be established ever The rod reproof give wisdom child left causeth shame mother When wicked are increased transgression increaseth righteous look fall Correct thy son give thee rest Yea give delight thy soul Where is vision people cast restraint keepeth law happy is he A servant not be corrected words understand not give heed Seest thou man is hasty words is more hope fool him He delicately bringeth servant child Shall have become son last An angry man stirreth strife wrathful man aboundeth transgression A man pride bring low is lowly spirit obtain honor Whoso is partner thief hateth own soul heareth adjuration uttereth nothing The fear man bringeth snare whoso putteth trust Jehovah be safe Many seek ruler favor man judgment   cometh   Jehovah An unjust man is abomination righteous is upright way is abomination wicked

descended hath gathered wind fists hath waters garment hath established ends earth is name is son name thou knowest word God is tried is shield take refuge him Add thou not words Lest reprove thee filthiness There is generation lofty are eyes eyelids are lifted up There is generation teeth are     swords jaw teeth   knives devour poor earth needy men The horseleach hath two daughters   crying   Give give are three things are never satisfied   Yea   four say not Enough Sheol barren womb earth is not satisfied water fire saith not Enough The eye mocketh father despiseth obey mother ravens valley pick young eagles eat are three things are too wonderful Yea four know not way eagle air way serpent rock way ship midst sea way man maiden So is way adulterous woman eateth wipeth mouth saith have done wickedness For three things earth tremble four     not bear servant is king fool is filled food odious woman is married handmaid is heir mistress There are four things are little earth are exceeding wise ants are people not strong provide food summer conies are feeble folk make houses rocks locusts have king go forth bands lizard taketh hold hands is kings palaces There are three things are stately march Yea four are stately going lion is mightiest beasts turneth not away greyhound he goat also king is rising up If thou hast done foolishly lifting thyself thou hast thought evil   Lay   thy hand thy mouth For churning milk bringeth forth butter wringing nose bringeth forth blood forcing wrath bringeth forth strife

words king Lemuel oracle mother taught him What son O son womb O son vows Give not thy strength unto women Nor thy ways destroyeth kings It is not kings O Lemuel is not kings drink wine princes   say   Where is strong drink Lest drink forget law pervert justice   due   is afflicted Give strong drink is ready perish wine bitter soul Let drink forget poverty remember misery more Open thy mouth dumb cause such are left desolate Open thy mouth judge righteously minister justice poor needy A worthy woman find price is far rubies The heart husband trusteth have lack gain She doeth good not evil days life She seeketh wool flax worketh willingly hands She is merchant ships bringeth bread afar She riseth also is yet night giveth food household task maidens She considereth field buyeth fruit hands planteth vineyard She girdeth loins strength maketh strong arms She perceiveth merchandise is profitable lamp goeth not night She hands distaff hands hold spindle She stretcheth hand poor Yea reacheth forth hands needy She is not afraid snow household household are clothed scarlet She maketh herself carpets tapestry clothing is fine linen purple Her husband is known gates sitteth elders land She maketh linen garments selleth delivereth girdles merchant Strength dignity are clothing laugheth time come She mouth wisdom law kindness is tongue She looketh well ways household eateth not bread idleness Her children rise up call blessed husband   also   praiseth   saying   Many daughters have done worthily thou excellest all Grace is deceitful beauty is vain     woman feareth Jehovah be praised Give her fruit hands let works praise gates

words Preacher son David king Jerusalem Vanity vanities saith Preacher vanity vanities is vanity What profit hath man labor wherein laboreth sun One generation goeth generation cometh earth abideth ever The sun also ariseth sun goeth down hasteth place ariseth The wind goeth south turneth north turneth continually course wind returneth again circuits All rivers run sea sea is not full place whither rivers go thither go again All things are full weariness man not utter   eye is not satisfied seeing ear filled hath been is be hath been done is be done is new thing sun Is there thing be said See is new hath been long ago ages were us There is remembrance former   generations   there be remembrance latter   generations   are come come Preacher was king Israel Jerusalem And applied heart seek search wisdom concerning is done heaven is sore travail God hath given sons men be exercised therewith I have seen works are done sun behold is vanity striving is crooked not be made straight is wanting not be numbered I communed mine own heart saying Lo have gotten great wisdom were Jerusalem yea heart hath had great experience wisdom knowledge And applied heart know wisdom know madness folly perceived also was striving wind For much wisdom is much grief increaseth knowledge increaseth sorrow

said heart Come now prove thee mirth therefore enjoy pleasure behold also was vanity I said laughter is mad mirth doeth searched heart cheer flesh wine heart yet guiding   wisdom lay hold folly till see was good sons men do heaven days life I made great works builded houses planted vineyards made gardens parks planted trees kinds fruit made pools water water therefrom forest trees were reared bought men servants maid servants had servants born house also had great possessions herds flocks were Jerusalem gathered also silver gold treasure kings provinces gat men singers women singers delights sons men musical instruments sorts So was great increased more were Jerusalem also wisdom remained me And whatsoever mine eyes desired kept not withheld not heart joy heart rejoiced labor was portion labor Then looked works hands had wrought labor had labored do behold was vanity striving wind was profit sun And turned behold wisdom madness folly     man   do   cometh king   even   hath been done long ago Then saw wisdom excelleth folly as far light excelleth darkness The wise man eyes are head fool walketh darkness yet perceived one event happeneth said heart happeneth fool so happen even was then more wise Then said heart also is vanity For wise man even fool is remembrance ever seeing days come have been long forgotten doth wise man die even fool So hated life work is wrought sun was grievous is vanity striving wind And hated labor wherein labored sun seeing leave man be me And knoweth be wise man fool yet have rule labor wherein have labored wherein have showed sun also is turned about cause heart despair concerning labor wherein had labored sun For is man labor is wisdom knowledge skilfulness yet man hath not labored therein leave portion also is vanity great evil For hath man labor striving heart wherein laboreth sun days are     sorrows travail is grief yea even night heart taketh rest also is vanity There is nothing better man     eat drink make soul enjoy good labor also saw is hand God For eat have enjoyment more man pleaseth   God   giveth wisdom knowledge joy sinner giveth travail gather heap give pleaseth God also is vanity striving wind

everything is season time purpose heaven time be born time die time plant time pluck is planted time kill time heal time break time build time weep time laugh time mourn time dance time cast away stones time gather stones together time embrace time refrain embracing time seek time lose time keep time cast away time rend time sew time keep silence time speak time love time hate time war time profit hath worketh wherein laboreth have seen travail God hath given sons men be exercised therewith He hath made everything beautiful time also hath set eternity heart yet man not find work God hath done beginning even end I know is nothing better rejoice do good so long live And also man eat drink enjoy good labor is gift God I know God doeth be ever nothing be put anything taken God hath done men fear is hath been long ago is be hath long ago been God seeketh again is passed moreover saw sun place justice wickedness was there place righteousness wickedness was there I said heart God judge righteous wicked is time there purpose work I said heart   is   sons men God prove see are     beasts For befalleth sons men befalleth beasts even one thing befalleth one dieth so other yea have one breath man hath preeminence beasts is vanity All go unto one place are dust turn dust again Who knoweth spirit man goeth upward spirit beast goeth downward earth saw is nothing better man rejoice works is portion bring   back   see be

Then returned saw oppressions are done sun behold tears such were oppressed had comforter side oppressors was power had comforter Wherefore praised dead have been long dead more living are yet alive better   did esteem   hath not yet been hath not seen evil work is done sun Then saw labor skilful work man is envied neighbor also is vanity striving wind The fool foldeth hands together eateth own flesh Better is handful quietness two handfuls labor striving wind Then returned saw vanity sun There is one is alone hath not second yea hath son brother is end labor are eyes satisfied riches then saith   do labor deprive soul good also is vanity yea is sore travail Two are better one have good reward labor For fall one lift fellow woe is alone falleth hath not lift up Again two lie together then have warmth one be warm   alone   man prevail is alone two withstand threefold cord is not quickly broken Better is poor wise youth old foolish king knoweth not receive admonition more For prison came forth be king yea even kingdom was born poor I saw living walk sun were youth second stood stead There was end people even was yet come not rejoice Surely also is vanity striving wind

Keep thy foot thou goest house God draw nigh hear is better give sacrifice fools know not do evil Be not rash thy mouth let not thy heart be hasty utter anything God God is heaven thou upon earth therefore let thy words be few For dream cometh multitude business fool voice multitude words When thou vow God defer not pay hath pleasure fools pay thou vowest Better is thou shouldest not vow thou shouldest vow not pay Suffer not thy mouth cause thy flesh sin say thou angel was error wherefore God be angry thy voice destroy work thy hands multitude dreams are vanities many words fear thou God If thou seest oppression poor violent taking away justice righteousness province marvel not matter one higher high regardeth are higher profit earth is king     is served field He loveth silver not be satisfied silver loveth abundance increase also is vanity When goods increase are increased eat advantage is there owner thereof save beholding   eyes sleep laboring man is sweet eat little much fulness rich not suffer sleep There is grievous evil have seen sun   namely   riches kept owner thereof hurt riches perish evil adventure hath begotten son is nothing hand As came forth mother womb naked go again came take nothing labor carry hand And also is grievous evil points came so go profit hath laboreth wind days also eateth darkness is sore vexed hath sickness wrath Behold have seen be good be comely is one eat drink enjoy good labor laboreth sun days life God hath given is portion Every man also God hath given riches wealth hath given power eat thereof take portion rejoice labor is gift God For not much remember days life God answereth     joy heart

is evil have seen sun is heavy men man God giveth riches wealth honor so lacketh nothing soul desireth yet God giveth not power eat thereof alien eateth is vanity is evil disease If man beget hundred children live many years days years are many soul be not filled good moreover have burial say untimely birth is better cometh vanity departeth darkness name thereof is covered darkness hath not seen sun known hath rest rather other yea live thousand years twice told yet enjoy good do not go one place labor man is mouth yet appetite is not filled For advantage hath wise more fool     hath poor man knoweth walk living Better is sight eyes wandering desire also is vanity striving hath been name thereof was given long ago is known man is contend is mightier he Seeing are many things increase vanity is man better knoweth is good man     life days vain life spendeth shadow tell man be sun

The heart wise is house mourning heart fools is house mirth It is better hear rebuke wise man hear song fools For crackling thorns pot so is laughter fool also is vanity Surely extortion maketh wise man foolish bribe destroyeth understanding Better is end thing beginning thereof   patient spirit is better proud spirit Be not hasty thy spirit be angry anger resteth bosom fools Say not thou is cause former days were better thou dost not inquire wisely concerning this Wisdom is as good inheritance more excellent is see sun For wisdom is defence even money is defence excellency knowledge is wisdom preserveth life hath it Consider work God make straight hath made crooked day prosperity be joyful day adversity consider God hath made one side side other end man not find anything   be   him All have seen days vanity is righteous man perisheth righteousness is wicked man prolongeth   life   evil doing Be not righteous overmuch make thyself overwise shouldest thou destroy Be not overmuch wicked be thou foolish shouldest thou die thy time is good thou shouldest take hold yea also withdraw not thy hand feareth God come forth all Wisdom is strength wise man more ten rulers are city Surely is not righteous man earth doeth good sinneth not Also take not heed words are spoken lest thou hear thy servant curse thee oftentimes also thine own heart knoweth thou likewise hast cursed others All have proved wisdom said be wise was far is is far off exceeding deep find turned about heart   was set   know search seek wisdom reason   things   know wickedness is folly foolishness is madness And find more bitter death woman heart is snares nets     hands are bands whoso pleaseth God escape sinner be taken   Behold have found saith Preacher   laying   one thing find account soul still seeketh have not found one man thousand have found woman have not found Behold only have found God made man upright have sought many inventions

is wise man knoweth interpretation thing man wisdom maketh face shine hardness face is changed I   counsel thee   Keep king command regard oath God Be not hasty go presence persist not evil thing doeth whatsoever pleaseth him For king word   hath   power say doest thou Whoso keepeth commandment know evil thing wise man heart discerneth time judgment purpose is time judgment misery man is great knoweth not be tell be is man hath power spirit retain spirit hath power day death is discharge war wickedness deliver is given it All have seen applied heart unto work is done sun   is   time one man hath power hurt So saw wicked buried came   grave   had done right went away holy place were forgotten city also is vanity Because sentence evil work is not executed speedily heart sons men is fully set do sinner do evil hundred times prolong   days   yet surely know be well fear God fear not be well wicked neither prolong     days   are   shadow feareth not God There is vanity is done earth are righteous men happeneth according work wicked again are wicked men happeneth according work righteous said also is vanity Then commended mirth man hath better thing sun eat drink be joyful abide labor     days life God hath given sun When applied heart know wisdom see business is done earth also is day night seeth sleep eyes   then beheld work God man not find work is done sun however much man labor seek yet not find moreover wise man think know yet not be able find

laid heart even explore righteous wise works are hand God be love hatred man knoweth not is them All things come alike is one event righteous wicked good clean unclean sacrificeth sacrificeth not is good so is sinner   sweareth feareth oath This is evil is done sun is one event yea also heart sons men is full evil madness is heart live   go   dead For is joined living is hope living dog is better dead lion For living know die dead know not anything have more reward memory is forgotten As well love hatred envy is perished long ago have more portion ever anything is done sun Go thy way eat thy bread joy drink thy wine merry heart God hath already accepted thy works Let thy garments be always white let not thy head lack oil Live joyfully wife thou lovest days thy life vanity hath given thee sun thy days vanity is thy portion life thy labor wherein thou laborest sun Whatsoever thy hand findeth do do   thy is work device knowledge wisdom Sheol whither thou goest I returned saw sun race is not swift battle strong yet bread wise yet riches men understanding yet favor men skill time chance happeneth man also knoweth not time fishes are taken evil net birds are caught snare even so are sons men snared evil time falleth suddenly them I have also seen wisdom sun wise seemed great was little city few men came great king besieged built great bulwarks it Now was found poor wise man wisdom delivered city man remembered same poor man Then said Wisdom is better strength nevertheless poor man wisdom is despised words are not heard The words wise heard quiet are better cry ruleth fools Wisdom is better weapons war one sinner destroyeth much good

Dead flies cause oil perfumer send forth evil odor so   little folly outweigh wisdom honor A wise man heart is right hand fool heart left Yea also fool walketh way understanding faileth saith one     is fool If spirit ruler rise up thee leave not thy place gentleness allayeth great is evil have seen sun were error proceedeth ruler folly is set great dignity rich sit low place I have seen servants horses princes walking servants earth He diggeth pit fall whoso breaketh wall serpent bite him Whoso stones be hurt therewith   cleaveth wood is endangered iron be blunt one do not whet edge then put more strength wisdom is profitable direct If serpent bite is charmed then is there advantage charmer The words wise man mouth are gracious lips fool swallow himself The beginning words mouth is foolishness end talk is mischievous madness A fool also multiplieth words   yet   man knoweth not be be tell labor fools one knoweth not go city Woe thee O land thy king is child thy princes eat morning Happy art thou O land thy king is son nobles thy princes eat due season strength not drunkenness slothfulness roof sinketh idleness hands house leaketh A feast is made laughter wine maketh glad life money answereth things Revile not king not thy thought revile not rich thy bedchamber bird heavens carry voice hath wings tell matter

Cast thy bread waters thou shalt find many days Give portion seven yea even unto eight thou knowest not evil be earth If clouds be full rain empty earth tree fall south north place tree falleth be He observeth wind not sow regardeth clouds not reap As thou knowest not is way wind     bones   do grow   womb is child even thou knowest not work God doeth morning sow thy seed evening withhold not thy hand thou knowest not prosper be alike good Truly light is sweet pleasant thing is eyes behold sun Yea man live many years let rejoice let remember days darkness be many cometh is vanity Rejoice O young man thy youth let thy heart cheer thee days thy youth walk ways thy heart sight thine eyes know thou things God bring thee judgment Therefore remove sorrow thy heart put evil thy flesh youth dawn life are vanity

Come down sit dust O virgin daughter Babylon sit ground throne O daughter thou shalt more be called tender delicate Take millstones grind meal remove thy veil strip train leg pass rivers Thy nakedness be uncovered thy shame be seen take vengeance spare man Our Redeemer Jehovah hosts is name Holy One Israel Sit thou silent get thee darkness O daughter thou shalt more be called mistress kingdoms I was wroth people profaned mine inheritance gave thy hand thou didst show mercy aged hast thou very heavily laid thy yoke And thou saidst be mistress ever thou didst not lay things thy heart didst remember latter end thereof Now therefore hear thou art given pleasures sittest securely sayest thy heart am is none else not sit widow know loss children two things come thee moment one day loss children widowhood full measure come thee multitude thy sorceries great abundance thine enchantments For thou hast trusted thy wickedness hast said None seeth thy wisdom thy knowledge hath perverted thee thou hast said thy heart am is none else me Therefore evil come thee not know dawning thereof mischief fall thee shalt not be able put away desolation come thee suddenly thou knowest not Stand now thine enchantments multitude thy sorceries wherein thou hast labored thy youth so be thou shalt be able profit so be thou mayest prevail Thou art wearied multitude thy counsels let now astrologers star gazers monthly prognosticators stand save thee things come thee Behold be stubble fire burn not deliver power flame not be coal warm fire sit before Thus things be unto thee wherein thou hast labored have trafficked thee thy youth wander one quarter be none save thee

Behold Jehovah hand is not shortened not save ear heavy not hear iniquities have separated God sins have hid face so not hear For hands are defiled blood fingers iniquity lips have spoken lies tongue muttereth wickedness None sueth righteousness none pleadeth truth trust vanity speak lies conceive mischief bring forth iniquity They hatch adders eggs weave spider web eateth eggs dieth is crushed breaketh viper Their webs not become garments cover works works are works iniquity act violence is hands Their feet run evil make haste shed innocent blood thoughts are thoughts iniquity desolation destruction are paths The way peace know not is justice goings have made crooked paths goeth therein doth not know peace Therefore is justice far doth righteousness overtake look light behold darkness brightness walk obscurity We grope wall blind grope have eyes stumble noonday twilight are lusty are dead men We roar like bears moan sore doves look justice is none salvation is far us For transgressions are multiplied thee sins testify transgressions are iniquities know transgressing denying Jehovah turning away following God speaking oppression revolt conceiving uttering heart words falsehood And justice is turned away backward righteousness standeth afar truth is fallen street uprightness not enter Yea truth is lacking departeth evil maketh prey Jehovah saw displeased was justice And saw was man wondered was intercessor therefore own arm brought salvation righteousness upheld him And put righteousness breastplate helmet salvation head put garments vengeance clothing was clad zeal mantle According deeds accordingly repay wrath adversaries recompense enemies islands repay recompense So fear name Jehovah west glory rising sun come rushing stream breath Jehovah driveth And Redeemer come Zion unto turn transgression Jacob saith Jehovah And is covenant saith Jehovah Spirit is thee words have put thy mouth not depart thy mouth mouth thy seed mouth thy seed seed saith Jehovah henceforth ever
