word Jehovah came saying Son man is vine tree more tree vine branch is trees forest Shall wood be taken thereof make work men take pin hang vessel thereon Behold is cast fire fuel fire hath devoured ends midst is burned is profitable work Behold was whole was meet work much less fire hath devoured is burned yet be meet work Therefore thus saith Lord Jehovah vine tree trees forest have given fire fuel so give inhabitants Jerusalem And set face go forth fire fire devour ye know am Jehovah set face them And make land desolate have committed trespass saith Lord Jehovah

Again word Jehovah came saying Son man cause Jerusalem know abominations say Thus saith Lord Jehovah unto Jerusalem Thy birth thy nativity is land Canaanite Amorite was thy father thy mother was Hittite And thy nativity day thou wast born thy navel was not cut wast thou washed water cleanse thee not salted swaddled all No eye pitied thee do things unto thee have compassion thee wast cast open field thy person was abhorred day thou wast born And passed thee saw thee weltering thy blood said unto thee   Though thou art   thy blood live said unto thee   Though thou art   thy blood live I caused thee multiply groweth field thou didst increase wax great thou attainedst excellent ornament thy breasts were fashioned thy hair was grown thou wast naked bare Now passed thee looked thee behold thy time was time love spread skirt thee covered thy nakedness yea sware unto thee entered covenant thee saith Lord Jehovah thou becamest mine Then washed thee water thoroughly washed away thy blood thee anointed thee oil I clothed thee also broidered work shod thee sealskin girded thee fine linen covered thee silk And decked thee ornaments put bracelets thy hands chain thy neck And put ring thy nose ear rings thine ears beautiful crown thy head Thus wast thou decked gold silver thy raiment was fine linen silk broidered work didst eat fine flour honey oil thou wast exceeding beautiful thou didst unto royal estate And thy renown went forth nations thy beauty was perfect majesty had put thee saith Lord Jehovah But thou didst trust thy beauty playedst harlot thy renown pouredst thy whoredoms one passed was And thou didst take thy garments madest thee high places decked divers colors playedst harlot   like things   not come be   so    Thou didst also take thy fair jewels gold silver had given thee madest thee images men didst play harlot thou tookest thy broidered garments coveredst didst set mine oil mine incense them My bread also gave thee fine flour oil honey wherewith fed thee thou didst even set sweet savor   thus   was saith Lord Jehovah Moreover thou hast taken thy sons thy daughters thou hast borne hast thou sacrificed be devoured Were thy whoredoms small matter thou hast slain children delivered causing pass fire   thine abominations thy whoredoms thou hast not remembered days thy youth thou wast naked bare wast weltering thy blood And is come pass thy wickedness woe thee saith Lord Jehovah thou hast built unto thee vaulted place hast made lofty place street Thou hast built thy lofty place head way hast made thy beauty abomination hast opened thy feet one passed multiplied thy whoredom Thou hast also committed fornication thy neighbors great flesh hast multiplied thy whoredom provoke anger Behold therefore have stretched hand thee have diminished thine ordinary   food   delivered thee hate thee daughters Philistines are ashamed thy lewd way Thou hast played harlot also thou wast insatiable thou hast played harlot yet thou wast not satisfied Thou hast moreover multiplied thy whoredom land traffic unto Chaldea yet thou wast not satisfied herewith How weak is thy heart saith Lord Jehovah seeing thou doest things work impudent harlot thou buildest thy vaulted place head way makest thy lofty place street hast not been harlot thou scornest hire A wife committeth adultery taketh strangers instead husband give gifts harlots thou givest thy gifts thy lovers bribest come unto thee side thy whoredoms And thou art different other   women thy whoredoms none followeth thee play harlot whereas thou givest hire hire is given unto thee therefore thou art different Wherefore O harlot hear word Jehovah Thus saith Lord Jehovah thy filthiness was poured thy nakedness uncovered thy whoredoms thy lovers idols thy abominations blood thy children thou didst give therefore behold gather thy lovers thou hast taken pleasure thou hast loved thou hast hated even gather thee side uncover thy nakedness see thy nakedness And judge thee women break wedlock shed blood are judged bring blood wrath jealousy I also give thee hand throw thy vaulted place break thy lofty places strip thee thy clothes take thy fair jewels leave thee naked bare They also bring company thee stone thee stones thrust thee swords And burn thy houses fire execute judgments thee sight many women cause thee cease playing harlot thou shalt also give hire more So cause wrath thee rest jealousy depart thee be quiet be no more angry Because thou hast not remembered days thy youth hast raged things therefore behold also bring thy way thy head saith Lord Jehovah thou shalt not commit lewdness thine abominations Behold one useth proverbs use     proverb thee saying As is mother so is daughter Thou art daughter thy mother loatheth husband children thou art sister thy sisters loathed husbands children mother was Hittite father Amorite And thine elder sister is Samaria dwelleth thy left hand daughters thy younger sister dwelleth thy right hand is Sodom daughters Yet hast thou not walked ways done abominations   were   very little   thing   thou wast more corrupt thy ways As live saith Lord Jehovah Sodom thy sister hath not done daughters thou hast done thou thy daughters Behold was iniquity thy sister Sodom pride fulness bread prosperous ease was daughters did strengthen hand poor needy And were haughty committed abomination therefore took saw   good   hath Samaria committed half thy sins hast multiplied thine abominations more hast justified thy sisters thine abominations thou hast done Thou also bear thou thine own shame thou hast given judgment thy sisters thy sins thou hast committed more abominable are more righteous thou yea be thou also confounded bear thy shame thou hast justified thy sisters And turn again captivity captivity Sodom daughters captivity Samaria daughters captivity thy captives midst thou mayest bear thine own shame mayest be ashamed thou hast done thou art comfort unto them And thy sisters Sodom daughters return former estate Samaria daughters return former estate thou thy daughters return former estate For thy sister Sodom was not mentioned thy mouth day thy pride thy wickedness was uncovered time reproach daughters Syria are round daughters Philistines do unto thee round hast borne thy lewdness thine abominations saith Jehovah For thus saith Lord Jehovah also deal thee thou hast done hast despised oath breaking covenant Nevertheless remember covenant thee days thy youth establish unto thee everlasting covenant Then shalt remember thy ways be ashamed thou shalt receive thy sisters thine elder   sisters   thy younger give thee daughters not thy covenant And establish covenant thee thou shalt know am Jehovah thou mayest remember be confounded never open thy mouth more thy shame have forgiven thou hast done saith Lord Jehovah

word Jehovah came saying Son man put riddle speak parable house Israel say Thus saith Lord Jehovah great eagle great wings long pinions full feathers had divers colors came unto Lebanon took top cedar cropped topmost young twigs thereof carried land traffic set city merchants He took also seed land planted fruitful soil placed beside many waters set willow tree And grew became spreading vine low stature branches turned roots were so became vine brought forth branches shot forth sprigs There was also great eagle great wings many feathers behold vine did bend roots shot forth branches beds plantation water it It was planted good soil many waters bring forth branches bear fruit be goodly vine Say thou Thus saith Lord Jehovah Shall not pull roots thereof cut fruit thereof wither fresh springing leaves wither not strong arm much people be raised roots thereof Yea behold being planted prosper not utterly wither east wind wither beds grew Moreover word Jehovah came saying Say now rebellious house Know ye not things mean tell Behold king Babylon came Jerusalem took king thereof princes thereof brought Babylon took seed royal made covenant also brought oath took mighty land kingdom be base not lift keeping covenant stand But rebelled sending ambassadors Egypt give horses much people Shall prosper escape doeth such things break covenant yet escape live saith Lord Jehovah surely place king dwelleth made king oath despised covenant brake even midst Babylon die Neither Pharaoh mighty army great company help war cast mounds build forts cut many persons For hath despised oath breaking covenant behold had given hand yet hath done things not escape Therefore thus saith Lord Jehovah live surely mine oath hath despised covenant hath broken even bring own head And spread net be taken snare bring Babylon enter judgment trespass hath trespassed fugitives bands fall sword remain be scattered wind ye know Jehovah have spoken it Thus saith Lord Jehovah also take lofty top cedar set crop topmost young twigs tender one plant high lofty mountain mountain height Israel plant bring forth boughs bear fruit be goodly cedar dwell birds wing shade branches thereof dwell And trees field know Jehovah have brought high tree have exalted low tree have dried green tree have made dry tree flourish Jehovah have spoken have done

word Jehovah came again saying mean ye ye use proverb concerning land Israel saying fathers have eaten sour grapes children teeth are set edge live saith Lord Jehovah ye not have   occasion   more use proverb Israel Behold souls are mine soul father so also soul son is mine soul sinneth die But man be just do is lawful right hath not eaten mountains hath lifted eyes idols house Israel neither hath defiled neighbor wife hath come woman impurity hath not wronged hath restored debtor pledge hath taken nought robbery hath given bread hungry hath covered naked garment hath not given forth upon interest hath taken increase hath withdrawn hand iniquity hath executed true justice man man hath walked statutes hath kept mine ordinances deal truly is just surely live saith Lord Jehovah If beget son is robber shedder blood doeth one things doeth not   duties   even hath mountains defiled neighbor wife hath wronged poor needy hath taken robbery hath not restored pledge hath lifted eyes idols hath committed abomination hath given forth upon interest hath taken increase then live not live hath done abominations surely die blood be him Now lo beget son seeth father sins hath done feareth doeth not such hath not eaten mountains hath lifted eyes idols house Israel hath not defiled neighbor wife hath wronged hath not taken aught pledge hath taken robbery hath given bread hungry hath covered naked garment hath hand poor hath not received interest increase hath executed mine ordinances hath walked statutes not die iniquity father surely live As father cruelly oppressed robbed brother did is not good people behold die iniquity Yet say Wherefore doth not son iniquity father son hath done is lawful right hath kept statutes hath done surely live The soul sinneth die son not bear iniquity father father iniquity son righteousness righteous be wickedness wicked be him But wicked turn sins hath committed keep statutes do is lawful right surely live not die None transgressions hath committed be remembered righteousness hath done live Have pleasure death wicked saith Lord Jehovah not rather return way live righteous turneth away righteousness committeth iniquity doeth according abominations wicked man doeth live None righteous deeds hath done be remembered trespass hath trespassed sin hath sinned die Yet ye say way Lord is not equal Hear now O house Israel Is not way equal are not ways unequal righteous man turneth away righteousness committeth iniquity dieth therein iniquity hath done die Again wicked man turneth away wickedness hath committed doeth is lawful right save soul considereth turneth away transgressions hath committed surely live not die Yet saith house Israel way Lord is not equal O house Israel are not ways equal are not ways unequal Therefore judge O house Israel one according ways saith Lord Jehovah Return ye turn yourselves transgressions so iniquity not be away transgressions wherein ye have transgressed make new heart new spirit ye die O house Israel have pleasure death dieth saith Lord Jehovah wherefore turn yourselves live

Moreover take thou lamentation princes Israel say was thy mother lioness couched lions midst young lions nourished whelps And brought one whelps became young lion learned catch prey devoured men The nations also heard was taken pit brought hooks land Egypt Now saw had waited hope was lost then took whelps made young lion And went up down lions became young lion learned catch prey devoured men And knew palaces laid waste cities land was desolate fulness thereof noise roaring Then nations set side provinces spread net was taken pit And put cage hooks brought king Babylon brought strongholds voice more be heard mountains Israel Thy mother was vine thy blood planted waters was fruitful full branches reason many waters And had strong rods sceptres bare rule stature was exalted thick boughs were seen   height multitude branches But was plucked fury was cast down ground east wind dried fruit strong rods were broken withered fire consumed them And now is planted wilderness dry thirsty land And fire is gone rods branches hath devoured fruit is strong rod be sceptre rule is lamentation be lamentation

came pass seventh year fifth   month   tenth   day   month certain elders Israel came inquire Jehovah sat me And word Jehovah came saying Son man speak elders Israel say Thus saith Lord Jehovah Is inquire ye are come live saith Lord Jehovah not be inquired you Wilt thou judge son man thou judge Cause know abominations fathers say Thus saith Lord Jehovah day chose Israel sware seed house Jacob made known land Egypt sware unto saying am Jehovah God day sware unto bring forth land Egypt land had searched flowing milk honey is glory lands And said Cast away man abominations eyes not yourselves idols Egypt am Jehovah God But rebelled not hearken did not man cast abominations eyes did forsake idols Egypt Then said pour wrath accomplish anger midst land Egypt But wrought name sake not be profaned sight nations were sight made known bringing forth land Egypt So caused go forth out land Egypt brought wilderness And gave statutes showed mine ordinances man do live them Moreover also gave sabbaths be sign know am Jehovah sanctifieth them But house Israel rebelled wilderness walked not statutes rejected mine ordinances man keep live sabbaths greatly profaned Then said pour wrath wilderness consume them But wrought name sake not be profaned sight nations sight brought also sware unto wilderness not bring land had given flowing milk honey is glory lands rejected mine ordinances walked not statutes profaned sabbaths heart went idols Nevertheless mine eye spared destroyed not did make full end wilderness And said children wilderness Walk ye not statutes fathers observe ordinances defile yourselves idols I am Jehovah God walk statutes keep mine ordinances do hallow sabbaths be sign ye know am Jehovah God But children rebelled walked not statutes kept mine ordinances do man do live profaned sabbaths Then said pour wrath accomplish anger wilderness Nevertheless withdrew hand wrought name sake not be profaned sight nations sight brought sware unto wilderness scatter nations disperse countries had not executed mine ordinances had rejected statutes had profaned sabbaths eyes were fathers idols Moreover also gave statutes were not good ordinances wherein not live polluted own gifts caused pass fire   openeth womb make desolate end know am Jehovah Therefore son man speak house Israel say Thus saith Lord Jehovah have fathers blasphemed have committed trespass me For had brought land sware give unto then saw high hill thick tree offered sacrifices there presented provocation offering also made sweet savor poured drink offerings Then said meaneth high place whereunto ye go name thereof is called Bamah day Wherefore say house Israel Thus saith Lord Jehovah Do ye pollute yourselves manner fathers play ye harlot abominations ye offer gifts ye make sons pass fire do ye pollute yourselves idols day be inquired O house Israel live saith Lord Jehovah not be inquired cometh mind not be ye say be nations families countries serve wood stone As live saith Lord Jehovah surely mighty hand outstretched arm wrath poured be king bring peoples gather countries wherein ye are scattered mighty hand outstretched arm wrath poured bring wilderness peoples there enter judgment face face Like entered judgment fathers wilderness land Egypt so enter judgment saith Lord Jehovah And cause pass rod bring bond covenant purge rebels transgress bring forth land sojourn not enter land Israel ye know am Jehovah As O house Israel thus saith Lord Jehovah Go ye serve one idols hereafter also ye not hearken holy name ye more profane gifts idols For holy mountain mountain height Israel saith Lord Jehovah house Israel serve land accept there require offerings first fruits oblations holy sweet savor accept bring peoples gather countries wherein ye have been scattered be sanctified sight nations And ye know am Jehovah bring land Israel country sware give fathers And there ye remember ways doings wherein ye have polluted yourselves ye loathe yourselves own sight evils ye have committed And ye know am Jehovah have dealt name sake not according evil ways according corrupt doings O ye house Israel saith Lord Jehovah And word Jehovah came saying Son man set thy face south drop   thy word   south prophesy forest field South say forest South Hear word Jehovah Thus saith Lord Jehovah Behold kindle fire thee devour green tree thee dry tree flaming flame not be quenched faces south north be burnt flesh see Jehovah have kindled not be quenched Then said Ah Lord Jehovah say Is not speaker parables

word Jehovah came saying Son man set thy face Jerusalem drop   thy word   sanctuaries prophesy land Israel say land Israel Thus saith Jehovah Behold am thee draw forth sword sheath cut thee righteous wicked Seeing then cut thee righteous wicked therefore sword go forth out sheath flesh south north flesh know Jehovah have drawn forth sword sheath not return more Sigh therefore thou son man breaking thy loins bitterness shalt thou sigh eyes And be say unto thee Wherefore sighest thou thou shalt tidings cometh heart melt hands be feeble spirit faint knees be weak water behold cometh be done saith Lord Jehovah And word Jehovah came saying Son man prophesy say Thus saith Jehovah Say A sword sword is sharpened also furbished is sharpened make slaughter is furbished be lightning then make mirth rod son contemneth tree And is given be furbished be handled sword is sharpened is furbished give hand slayer Cry wail son man is upon people is princes Israel are delivered sword people smite therefore thy thigh For is trial even rod contemneth be more saith Lord Jehovah Thou therefore son man prophesy smite thy hands together let sword be doubled third time sword deadly wounded is sword great one is deadly wounded entereth chambers I have set threatening sword gates heart melt stumblings be multiplied ah is made lightning is pointed slaughter Gather thee together go right set array go left thy face is set I also smite hands together cause wrath rest Jehovah have spoken it The word Jehovah came again saying Also thou son man appoint thee two ways sword king Babylon come twain come forth one land mark place mark head way city Thou shalt appoint way sword come Rabbah children Ammon Judah Jerusalem fortified For king Babylon stood parting way head two ways use divination shook arrows fro consulted teraphim looked liver In right hand was divination     Jerusalem set battering rams open mouth slaughter lift voice shouting set battering rams gates cast mounds build forts And be unto false divination sight have sworn oaths bringeth iniquity remembrance be taken Therefore thus saith Lord Jehovah ye have made iniquity be remembered transgressions are uncovered doings sins do appear ye are come remembrance ye be taken hand And thou O deadly wounded wicked one prince Israel day is come time iniquity end thus saith Lord Jehovah Remove mitre take crown   be   more same is low abase is high   overturn overturn overturn also be no more come right is give      And thou son man prophesy say Thus saith Lord Jehovah concerning children Ammon concerning reproach say thou A sword sword is drawn slaughter is furbished cause devour be lightning see thee false visions divine lies unto thee lay thee necks wicked are deadly wounded day is come time iniquity end Cause return sheath place thou wast created land thy birth judge thee And pour mine indignation thee blow thee fire wrath deliver thee hand brutish men skilful destroy Thou shalt be fuel fire thy blood be midst land shalt be more remembered Jehovah have spoken

Moreover word Jehovah came saying thou son man thou judge judge bloody city then cause know abominations And thou shalt say Thus saith Lord Jehovah city sheddeth blood midst time come maketh idols defile Thou art become guilty thy blood thou hast shed art defiled thine idols thou hast made thou hast caused thy days draw art come even unto thy years therefore have made reproach nations mocking countries Those are are far thee mock thee thou infamous one     full tumult Behold princes Israel one according power have been thee shed blood In thee have set light father mother midst thee have dealt oppression sojourner thee have wronged fatherless widow Thou hast despised holy things hast profaned sabbaths Slanderous men have been thee shed blood thee have eaten mountains midst thee have committed lewdness In thee have uncovered fathers nakedness thee have humbled was unclean impurity And one hath committed abomination neighbor wife hath lewdly defiled daughter in law thee hath humbled sister father daughter In thee have taken bribes shed blood hast taken interest increase thou hast greedily gained thy neighbors oppression hast forgotten saith Lord Jehovah Behold therefore have smitten hand thy dishonest gain thou hast made thy blood hath been midst thee Can thy heart endure thy hands be strong days deal thee Jehovah have spoken do it And scatter thee nations disperse thee countries consume thy filthiness thee And thou shalt be profaned thyself sight nations thou shalt know am word Jehovah came saying Son man house Israel is become dross are brass tin iron lead midst furnace are dross silver Therefore thus saith Lord Jehovah ye are become dross therefore behold gather midst Jerusalem As gather silver brass iron lead tin midst furnace blow fire melt so gather mine anger wrath lay there melt you Yea gather blow fire wrath ye be melted midst thereof As silver is melted midst furnace ye be melted midst thereof ye know Jehovah have poured wrath word Jehovah came saying Son man say Thou art land is not cleansed rained day indignation There is conspiracy prophets midst thereof roaring lion ravening prey have devoured souls take treasure precious things have made widows many midst thereof Her priests have done violence law have profaned holy things have made distinction holy common have caused men discern unclean clean have hid eyes sabbaths am profaned them Her princes midst thereof are wolves ravening prey shed blood     destroy souls get dishonest gain And prophets have daubed untempered   mortar   seeing false visions divining lies saying Thus saith Lord Jehovah Jehovah hath not spoken The people land have used oppression exercised robbery have vexed poor needy have oppressed sojourner wrongfully And sought man build wall stand gap land not destroy found none Therefore have poured mine indignation have consumed fire wrath own way have brought heads saith Lord Jehovah

word Jehovah came again saying Son man were two women daughters one mother played harlot Egypt played harlot youth were breasts pressed there was handled bosom virginity And names were Oholah elder Oholibah sister became mine bare sons daughters names Samaria is Oholah Jerusalem Oholibah And Oholah played harlot was mine doted lovers     neighbors were clothed blue governors rulers desirable young men horsemen riding horses And bestowed whoredoms choicest men Assyria doted idols defiled hath left whoredoms days   Egypt youth lay handled bosom virginity poured whoredom   Wherefore delivered hand lovers hand doted These uncovered nakedness took sons daughters slew sword became byword women executed judgments her And sister Oholibah saw was more corrupt doting whoredoms were more whoredoms sister She doted governors rulers     neighbors clothed most gorgeously horsemen riding upon horses desirable young men And saw was defiled took one way And increased whoredoms saw men portrayed wall images portrayed vermilion girded girdles loins flowing turbans heads princes look likeness Chaldea land nativity And as soon saw doted sent messengers Chaldea And came bed love defiled whoredom was polluted soul was alienated them So uncovered whoredoms uncovered nakedness then soul was alienated soul was alienated sister Yet multiplied whoredoms remembering days youth wherein had played harlot land Egypt And doted paramours flesh is flesh asses issue is issue horses Thus thou calledst remembrance lewdness thy youth handling thy bosom breasts thy youth Therefore O Oholibah thus saith Lord Jehovah Behold raise thy lovers thee thy soul is alienated bring thee side Pekod Shoa Koa     desirable young men governors rulers princes men renown riding horses And come thee weapons chariots wagons company peoples set thee buckler shield helmet round commit judgment judge thee according judgments And set jealousy thee deal thee fury take thy nose thine ears thy residue fall sword take thy sons thy daughters thy residue be devoured fire They also strip thee thy clothes take thy fair jewels Thus make thy lewdness cease thee thy whoredom   brought   land Egypt thou shalt not lift thine eyes remember Egypt more For thus saith Lord Jehovah Behold deliver thee hand thou hatest hand thy soul is alienated deal thee hatred take thy labor leave thee naked bare nakedness thy whoredoms be uncovered thy lewdness thy whoredoms These things be done unto thee thou hast played harlot nations thou art polluted idols Thou hast walked way thy sister therefore give cup thy hand Thus saith Lord Jehovah Thou shalt drink thy sister cup is deep large shalt be laughed scorn had derision containeth much Thou shalt be filled drunkenness sorrow cup astonishment desolation cup thy sister Samaria Thou shalt even drink drain thou shalt gnaw sherds thereof shalt tear thy breasts have spoken saith Lord Jehovah Therefore thus saith Lord Jehovah thou hast forgotten cast thy back therefore bear thou also thy lewdness thy whoredoms Jehovah said moreover unto Son man judge Oholah Oholibah then declare abominations For have committed adultery blood is hands idols have committed adultery have also caused sons bare pass fire   be devoured Moreover have done have defiled sanctuary same day have profaned sabbaths For had slain children idols then came same day sanctuary profane thus have done midst house And furthermore ye have sent men come far unto messenger was sent came thou didst wash thyself paint thine eyes deck ornaments   sit stately bed table prepared whereupon thou didst set mine incense mine oil And voice multitude being ease was men common sort were brought drunkards wilderness put bracelets hands   twain   beautiful crowns heads Then said was old adulteries Now play harlot     went go unto harlot so went unto Oholah unto Oholibah lewd women And righteous men judge judgment adulteresses judgment women shed blood are adulteresses blood is hands For thus saith Lord Jehovah bring company give be tossed fro robbed And company stone stones despatch swords slay sons daughters burn houses fire Thus cause lewdness cease land women be taught not do lewdness And recompense lewdness ye bear sins idols ye know am Lord Jehovah

Again ninth year tenth month tenth   day   month word Jehovah came saying Son man write thee name day   even   selfsame day king Babylon drew close unto Jerusalem selfsame day And parable rebellious house say Thus saith Lord Jehovah Set caldron set also pour water gather pieces thereof even good piece thigh shoulder fill choice bones Take choice flock also pile   wood   bones caldron   make boil well let bones thereof be boiled midst it Wherefore thus saith Lord Jehovah Woe bloody city caldron rust is therein rust is not gone take piece piece lot is fallen it For blood is midst set bare rock poured not ground cover cause wrath come take vengeance have set blood bare rock not be covered Therefore thus saith Lord Jehovah Woe bloody city also make pile great Heap wood make fire hot boil well flesh make thick broth let bones be burned Then set empty coals thereof be hot brass thereof burn filthiness be molten rust be consumed She hath wearied     toil great rust goeth not forth rust   goeth not forth   fire In thy filthiness is lewdness have cleansed thee thou wast not cleansed thou shalt not be cleansed thy filthiness more till have caused wrath thee rest   Jehovah have spoken come pass do not go back spare repent according thy ways according thy doings judge thee saith Lord Jehovah Also word Jehovah came saying Son man behold take away thee desire thine eyes stroke yet thou shalt mourn weep thy tears run down Sigh not aloud make mourning dead bind thy headtire thee put thy shoes thy feet cover not thy lips eat not bread men So spake people morning even wife died did morning was commanded And people said Wilt thou not tell things are thou doest so Then said word Jehovah came saying Speak house Israel Thus saith Lord Jehovah Behold profane sanctuary pride power desire eyes soul pitieth sons daughters ye have left fall sword And ye do have done ye not cover lips eat bread tires be heads shoes feet ye not mourn weep ye pine iniquities moan one another Thus Ezekiel be unto sign according hath done ye do cometh then ye know am Lord Jehovah And thou son man not be day take strength joy glory desire eyes whereupon set heart sons daughters day escapeth come unto thee cause thee hear thine ears day thy mouth be opened is escaped thou shalt speak be no more dumb so shalt thou be sign know am Jehovah

word Jehovah came saying Son man set thy face children Ammon prophesy say children Ammon Hear word Lord Jehovah Thus saith Lord Jehovah thou saidst Aha sanctuary was profaned land Israel was made desolate house Judah went captivity therefore behold deliver thee children east possession set encampments thee make dwellings thee eat thy fruit drink thy milk And make Rabbah stable camels children Ammon couching place flocks ye know am Jehovah For thus saith Lord Jehovah thou hast clapped thy hands stamped feet rejoiced thy soul land Israel therefore behold have stretched hand thee deliver thee spoil nations cut thee peoples cause thee perish countries destroy thee thou shalt know am Jehovah Thus saith Lord Jehovah Moab Seir do say Behold house Judah is nations therefore behold open side Moab cities cities are frontiers glory country Beth jeshimoth Baal meon Kiriathaim children east   go   children Ammon give possession children Ammon not be remembered nations and execute judgments Moab know am Jehovah Thus saith Lord Jehovah Edom hath dealt house Judah taking vengeance hath greatly offended revenged therefore thus saith Lord Jehovah stretch hand Edom cut man beast make desolate Teman even Dedan fall sword And lay vengeance Edom hand people Israel do Edom according mine anger according wrath know vengeance saith Lord Jehovah Thus saith Lord Jehovah Philistines have dealt revenge have taken vengeance soul destroy perpetual enmity therefore thus saith Lord Jehovah Behold stretch hand cut destroy remnant sea coast And execute great vengeance wrathful rebukes know am Jehovah lay vengeance

came pass eleventh year first   day   month word Jehovah came saying Son man Tyre hath said Jerusalem Aha is broken   was gate peoples is turned be replenished now is laid waste therefore thus saith Lord Jehovah Behold am thee O Tyre cause many nations come thee sea causeth waves come up And destroy walls Tyre break towers also scrape dust make bare rock She be place spreading nets midst sea have spoken saith Lord Jehovah become spoil nations And daughters are field be slain sword know am Jehovah For thus saith Lord Jehovah Behold bring Tyre Nebuchadrezzar king Babylon king kings north horses chariots horsemen company much people He slay sword thy daughters field make forts thee cast mound thee raise buckler thee And set battering engines thy walls axes break thy towers By reason abundance horses dust cover thee thy walls shake noise horsemen wagons chariots enter thy gates men enter city wherein is made breach With hoofs horses tread thy streets slay thy people sword pillars thy strength go ground And make spoil thy riches make prey thy merchandise break thy walls destroy thy pleasant houses lay thy stones thy timber thy dust midst waters And cause noise thy songs cease sound thy harps be no more heard And make thee bare rock shalt be place spreading nets thou shalt be built more Jehovah have spoken saith Lord Jehovah Thus saith Lord Jehovah Tyre not isles shake sound thy fall wounded groan slaughter is made midst thee Then princes sea come thrones lay robes strip broidered garments clothe trembling sit ground tremble moment be astonished thee And take lamentation thee say thee How art thou destroyed wast inhabited seafaring men renowned city was strong sea inhabitants caused terror be dwelt Now isles tremble day thy fall isles are sea be dismayed thy departure For thus saith Lord Jehovah make thee desolate city cities are not inhabited bring deep upon thee great waters cover thee then bring descend pit people old time make thee dwell nether parts earth places are desolate old go down pit thou be not inhabited set glory land living I make thee terror thou shalt more have being thou be sought yet shalt thou never be found again saith Lord Jehovah
